name: Athena
title: Goddess of Wisdom
lore: Olympian goddess of wisdom and war, daughter of Zeus, was accompanied by the owl, her messenger and symbol. Possessing radiant and dignified beauty, she taught humankind countless crafts and techniques, protected all aspects of human production and life, guided them to victory in war, and nurtured countless human heroes. She was also a defender of order, helping humanity establish a system of laws.

talent_levels.effect:
Each attack deals additional physical damage equal to 12% of own lost HP. For each enemy hit, recovers 6% of lost HP.
When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor] enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, the effect of [Battle Resolve] is increased by 30%.
While in [Grace] status, [Battle Resolve] additionally increases by 30%.
[Life Link] Additionally grants target [Fervor].
[Counter Helix] Trigger probability increased by an additional 20%.
Increases own Block by 120 and HP by 8%.
Increases own Block by 200.

skills.name: Martial Verdict
skills.description: Sacrifices 40% of current HP to gain a shield equal to 60% of Max HP for 8 seconds. Slams the ground at the target location, inflicting [Taunt] on enemies within a large circular area for 8 seconds, and dealing physical damage equal to 200% of Attack.

skills.name: Aegis of Echoes
skills.description: Gains [Fervor] and throws a shield at a single target that ricochets between random enemies, bouncing up to 5 times before returning to self. Each bounce deals physical damage equal to 75% of Attack. Each individual enemy can only be hit once.

skills.name: Life Link
skills.description: When an allied Luminary's HP falls below 30%, forms a Life Link with them, increasing the target's Damage Reduction by 20% and redirecting 60% of damage taken by the target to self. Lasts for 8 seconds. This effect can trigger only once on each Luminary.

skills.name: Counter Helix
skills.description:
When taking damage, has a 25% chance to deal physical damage equal to 140% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area (can trigger once every 2 seconds at most).
Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, the trigger chance increases to 35%, and this skill has no cooldown for the duration.

skills.name: Holy Counter
skills.description: [Counter Helix] Increases casting speed by 30%, and basic attacks also have a 40% chance to trigger [Counter Helix].

name: Prometheus
title: The Goddess Who Stole Fire
lore: Prometheus, one of the Titans, is renowned for creating humankind and stealing fire from the gods. As a visionary, she sculpted humans from clay and imbued them with life, consistently playing the role of humanity's protector. However, in defiance of Zeus's will to treat humanity as puppets, she stole fire and sent it to humankind, angering the king of the gods and being eternally chained to a cliff in the Caucasus Mountains, where she endured the daily torment of having her liver devoured. She is a symbol of the dawn of civilization.

talent_levels.effect: While present, reduces the critical strike damage of all enemy units by 32%. If the critical strike damage from the source of the critical strike is greater than 150% , it will be calculated as 150%.
Each time you gain [Awakening], reduce the cooldown of all your skills by one second.
The stealing effect of [Nebula Chains] is increased by 50%.
At the start of combat, apply the [Nebula Chains] steal effect to the current target, and remove the restriction that [Nebula Chains] can only steal from one target at a time.
Increases own health by 12% and critical hit damage by 8%.
Increases own critical hit damage by 20%.

skills.name: Nebula Chains
skills.description: Steal 20% of attack, 20% of both defenses, 300% Crit Rate, 300% Dodge, 300% Block, and 30% Crit Damage from a single target (cannot be applied to bosses), lasting 8 seconds. This effect cannot be stacked and can only be applied to one target at a time. Afterwards, restore 50% of your maximum health and 100% rage, and deal magic damage equal to 880% of your attack to enemy units within a large circular area.

skills.name: Cross Chain Strike
skills.description: Throw the chain into an X-shaped area, crossing at the enemy unit with the highest attack and dealing magic damage equal to 600% of your attack. Each chain also deals magic damage equal to 200% of your attack to any enemy unit it touches. As your health decreases, you accumulate rage. When rage is full, you enter the [Wild] state. In [Wild] state, damage dealt to targets becomes magic damage equal to 600% of your attack + 600% of the target's attack (up to a maximum of 2400% of your attack ) and includes a 100% health conversion.

skills.name: Rose Energy Assault
skills.description: After each skill is used, the next basic attack is enhanced, dealing magic damage equal to 480% of the user's attack to enemy units within a large circular area and granting the user a shield equal to 20% of their maximum health for 6 seconds, which can stack up to 3 times.

skills.name: Triple Spiral
skills.description:
Throw out the spiral lock key, dealing magic damage equal to 550% of your attack to enemy units in a straight line , and granting yourself a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health * your current [Awakening] stacks, lasting for 10 seconds, then consuming all of your [Awakening] stacks.
While in the [Wild] state, [Awakening] will not be consumed.
Each time our side unleashes an ultimate skill, we gain 1 stack of [Awakening].

skills.name: The Way of Man
skills.description: [Nebula Chains] The duration of the stealing effect is extended by 4 seconds.

name: Anubis
title: Judge of the Underworld
lore: Anubis is the god of death, the son of Set, the god of the desert, and his wife Nephthys. He is in charge of the making of mummies and the guidance and judgment of the dead.

talent_levels.effect:
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle].
Consumes 3/7 stacks of [Deathrattle] to gain immunity to the first/second instance of fatal damage received, recovering 50% of Max HP (cannot trigger if there are insufficient [Deathrattle] stacks).
[Descending Judgement] After dealing Damage, has a 50% chance to inflict [Shock].
Increases own Physical Defense by 15% and HP by 5%.
For each stack of [Deathrattle] consumed, gains a sheild equal to 4% of Max HP, lasting for 8 seconds.
[Heart's Balance] Can be triggered +1 time. On the 3rd trigger, consumes 15 stack(s) of [Deathrattle].

skills.name: Descending Judgement
skills.description:
Whenever gaining [Deathrattle], deals magic damage equal to 7% of Max HP to enemies within a large circular area.
After casting, increases Physical Defense and Magic Defense by 25% for 10 seconds. During this time, whenever gaining [Deathrattle], has a 50% chance to gain an additional stack of [Deathrattle].

skills.name: Sand Shield
skills.description: Gains a shield equal to 13% of Max HP, and grants an equal shield to the ally with the lowest HP. Lasts 8 seconds.

skills.name: Might of the Dunes
skills.description: In battle, increases HP by 13%. HP increases by 6% each time [Descending Judgement] is cast. Stacks up to 5 times.

skills.name: Sands of Solace
skills.description: Grants all allied ranged Luminaries 3 [Balance]. Each scale increases Damage Reduction by 12.5%. This skill only activates once at the start of battle.

skills.name: Shelter of the Yellow Sands
skills.description: [Sand Shield] Targets an additional ally with the lowest HP.

name: Caesar
title: The Triumphant Princess
lore: Caesar Nibelungen was the eldest daughter of Constantine XI, crown princess, and heir to the Nibelgarde Empire. As a member of the royal family, she was accompanied by heavy courses and training from a young age. Even in her youth, Caesar had already noticed the doubts within the country about her as the female heir, but only her father was determined to make her the crown prince. To repay this trust, she worked far beyond what ordinary people could do to gain more recognition and support, and thus gradually became recognized by the people as a leader they would follow to the death.

talent_levels.effect: [Radiant Barrier] Gain one stack of [Guardian Shield] for each bullet blocked. Each stack of [Guardian Shield] increases your shield efficiency by 2.5% and both physical and magical defense by 2.5%, stacking up to 30 times, lasting until the end of the battle.
[Radiant Barrier] grants a random [Blessing Buff] to the user for every 10 bullets blocked (prioritizing those not currently active).
Increases own magic defense by 15% and health by 5%.

When [Unyielding Echo] is triggered, it grants the user additional immunity to damage for 6 seconds. Whenever the user gains a [Blessing Buff], it provides a shield equal to 15% of the user's maximum health, stacking up to 3 times and lasting for 7 seconds.
[Radiant Barrier] automatically creates a barrier when the enemy first uses their ultimate skill.

skills.name: Radiant Barrier
skills.description: Deals physical damage equal to 620% of the caster's attack plus 1600% of the caster's combined defense and magic resistance to enemy units within a fan-shaped area. Then creates a barrier in front of the caster that lasts for 5 seconds, intercepting up to 20 bullets. The barrier is considered broken if it reaches its maximum interception limit. When the barrier is broken, all enemy Luminaries' next ultimate skill costs +1.

skills.name: Earthe Shattering Strike
skills.description: Slam down the shield, dealing physical damage equal to 520 of the user's attack plus 800% of the sum of the user's defense and magic resistance to enemy units within a large circular area. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When the [Punishment] effect is triggered, it will inflict a 3-second [Stun] on the target.

skills.name: Unyielding Echo
skills.description: When receiving fatal damage, become immune to the damage and consume all [Guardian Shield]. Each stack consumed restores 3% of your maximum health. This effect can trigger at most once every 25 seconds.

skills.name: Servant Inspiration
skills.description: Strike the shield to grant allied units in a straight line behind the user [Morale] and a shield equal to 16% of the user's maximum health, lasting 8 seconds. When the user has both [Morale] and [Fervor], they enter the [Grace] state. While in the [Grace] state, the shield provided by this skill is doubled and additionally provides [Magic Defense].

skills.name: Holy Light Barrier
skills.description: [Radiant Barrier] When the shield is broken, it grants an additional shield equal to 40% of the user's maximum health for 12 seconds.

name: Duvalin
title: Forged Dragon Princess
lore: As the guardian appointed by the gods, Duvalin has shouldered the responsibility of maintaining life in the Nine Realms since ancient times. She was granted the power to control flames and forge, and leads the valiant Red Dragon Legion.

talent_levels.effect: Increases own block chance by 280/310/340/370/400/430/460. Recovers 15% of rage upon triggering a block. Rage accumulates as health decreases. When rage is full, enters the [Wild] state. In [Wild] state, further increases own block chance by 280/310/340/370/400/430/460 , and every 2 seconds deals physical damage equal to 230%/250%/270%/290%/310%/330%/350% of own attack to enemies within a large circular area, with a 20% chance to inflict [Ignite]. This chance increases by 1% for every 100 block chance the user possesses.
After triggering an elemental reaction, additionally applies an attack reduction effect to the target.
Increases own health by 10% and block by 50.
Whenever you take damage equal to 30% of your maximum health, reduce the cooldown of [Dragon Human Form] by 2 seconds and remove the [Increased Energy Cost for Next Ultimate] effect applied to you.
Whenever the user releases [Dragon Human Form], all allied units gain [Physical Defense Up] and all allied Luminaries are cleared of the [Increased Energy Cost for Next Ultimate] effect.

skills.name: Dragon Human Form
skills.description: Dispels all debuffs on itself, restores 33%/36%/39%/42%/45%/48% of its maximum health and 100% rage, and deals physical damage equal to 165%/180%/195%/210%/225%/240% of its attack to enemy units in a large circular area. If the user is already in the [Wild] state when released, the recovery amount is increased by 40%.

skills.name: Flaming Blade Returns to Heaven
skills.description: Throws a blade at the furthest enemy Luminary, dealing physical damage equal to 210%/230%/250%/270%/310% of the user's attack and bouncing back to grant the user a shield equal to 21%/23%/25%/27%/31% of their maximum health for 6 seconds. If the blade hits a target with an elemental debuff, it instead grants a shield to allied units within a larger circular area.

skills.name: Crimson Scale Gauntlets
skills.description: During battle, increases own HP by 18%/19%/20%/21%/22%/23%. Each time the effect of increasing the energy consumption of the next ultimate skill is applied, restores HP equal to 9%/9.5%/10%/10.5%/11%/11.5% of maximum HP.

skills.name: Dragon Shadow Slash
skills.description: Deals three consecutive slashes to a single target, resulting in physical damage equal to 480%/520%/560%/600%/640% of the user's attack, and grants the user [Physical Defense Up]. While in [Wild] state, the user also knocks the target into the air.

skills.name: Red Scale Crazy Armor
skills.description: When the [Crimson Scale Gauntlets] Luminary is affected by the [Increased Energy Cost for Next Ultimate Skill] effect, it recovers 5% of its maximum HP.

name: Helveil
title: Fallen Warborn Goddess
lore: Although once a Valkyrie of Valhalla, she betrayed the path of light and chose to join the Wild Hunt. She finds pleasure in deception, often posing as a holy Valkyrie to trick the valiant souls of warriors. Obsessed with the thrill of battle, her ferocious, beast-like fighting style is terrifying. It is said that in a rage, she broke off one of her own wings.

talent_levels.effect:
When on the battlefield, increases Crit Resist of all allied Luminaries and Wyrms by 180. After taking non-critical damage, has a 15% chance to restore 2% of Max HP.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Crit Resist increases by an additional 20.
When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, the healing effect of [Soul Domain] is doubled.
Provides self with 15% Magic Defense and 50 Crit Resist.
[Spirit Shackles] Inflicts [Attack Down] after dealing Damage.
When taking damage, if the attacker's Crit is lower than own Crit Resist, increases own Damage Reduction by 30%.

skills.name: Spirit Shackles
skills.description: Summons a shield formation for 5 seconds, dealing physical damage equal to 280% of Attack to enemies within a massive circular area. While this Shield Formation is active, gains immunity to control effects and Damage Reduction is increased by 100%. When taking damage from a unit outside the Shield Formation, this Damage Reduction effect is increased to 200%. When the Shield Formation ends, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. When casting skills, gains a shield equal to 24% of Max HP for 8 seconds.

skills.name: Soul Suck
skills.description: Absorbs the souls of enemies within a medium cone-shaped area. For each target affected, gains a shield equal to 9% of Max HP for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Dark Shield
skills.description:
In battle, increases HP by 10%.
If self-generated shield is not broken within its duration, deals physical damage equal to 15% of Max HP to enemies in a large circular area and inflicts [Crit Down].

skills.name: Twilight Duality
skills.description: Spins around and smashes the ground, dealing physical damage equal to 140% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area and gaining [Fervor].

skills.name: The More They Fight, The Stronger They Become
skills.description: When [Spirit Shackles] ends, each unit within the shield array recovers 3.5% of its maximum health.

name: Pompey
title: Ironclad Commander
lore: A general of the Nibelgard Empire, commanding a large army, decisive in battle, and single-handedly guarding both the inside and outside.

talent_levels.effect:
After dealing damage, applies 1 stack of [Commander's Intimidation], reducing the target's damage dealt to the caster by 8% for 8s. Stacks up to 5 times.
When any enemy reaches 5 stacks of [Commander's Intimidation], enters [Momentum Burst], gaining bonus Attack equal to 8.5% of Max HP for 8s.
[Dominion Slash - Intimidate] Additionally increases the target's next Overdrive Energy Consumption by 1 before dealing damage.
Increases HP by 10% and Attack by 5%.
[Dominion Slash - Intimidate] When dealing damage to a target with 5 stacks of [Commander's Intimidation], immediately restores HP equal to 180% of Attack plus 24% of lost HP.
While under [Momentum Burst], when [Dominion Slash - Intimidate] triggers [Punishment], it instead applies 5 stacks of [Commander's Intimidation] to the target.

skills.name: Dominion Slash - Intimidate
skills.description: Pulls a single enemy into the line of fire and delivers a brutal slash, dealing physical damage equal to 800% of Attack. Damage is increased by 20% for each stack of [Commander's Intimidation] on the traget. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] is triggered, applies 2 additional stacks of [Commander's Intimidation] to the target before dealing damage.

skills.name: Ironclad Surge
skills.description: Deals physical damage equal to 300% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area. Recovers HP equal to 90% of Attack + 8% of lost HP for each target hit.

skills.name: Battleborn of Slaughter
skills.description: In battle, increases HP by 13%. Gains [Awakening] when an ally unleashes an Overdrive. While possessing [Awakening], consumes it to cast [Ironclad Surge] an additional time.

skills.name: Crimson Onslaught
skills.description: Whenever an enemy with 5 stacks of [Commander's Intimidation] dies, immediately gains a shield equal to 28% of Max HP for 6s and resets the cooldown of [Dominion Slash - Intimidate].

skills.name: Raging Battle Spirit
skills.description: [Ironclad Surge] has a 50% chance to apply an additional stack of [Commander's Intimidation] when dealing damage.

name: Salome
title: Seven-Veil Dancer
lore: Salome grew up in the treacherous depths of the court, witnessing the deepest darkness of humanity from a young age. Her mother molded her into the sharpest weapon, concealing her brilliance with her unparalleled beauty and captivating dance. Whenever her mother acted on her love, she would grant her mother's wishes, even if it meant taking another's life. Her mother was undoubtedly satisfied and proud, but poor Salome could no longer distinguish the boundary between love and death.

talent_levels.effect: During battle, increases own evasion by 900/990/1080/1440. Each time you successfully dodge damage, you recover 6%/6.3%/6.6%/7.8% of your maximum health and apply 1 stack of [Drunken Dance of Shadows] to the source of the damage. While on the field, whenever an allied unit applies [Shock] to an enemy, that allied unit gains 3.4%/3.7%/4%/5.2% increased damage and reduced damage for 7 seconds, stacking up to 10 times.
[Sand Dance] skill applies [Shock] to all four single-target attacks.
Increases own magic defense by 15% and health by 5%.
When our Luminary triggers [Detonation] or [Flash Freeze], it will additionally inflict [Accuracy Down] and 1 stack of [Drunken Fragrance].

When [Drunken Fragrance] is fully stacked, it applies [Charm] to enemy units within a medium circular area for 5 seconds and restores the user's health equal to 30% of their maximum health. (This effect can trigger a maximum of once per target within 15 seconds.)

skills.name: Sand Dance
skills.description: Gains [Significant Attack Speed Boost]. Charges towards a single target, dealing 4 instances of magic damage equal to 35%/39%/55% of the user's current health. Damage is increased by 20% for each stack of [Drunken Fragrance] on the target. At the end of the dance, it deals magic damage equal to 650%/700%/900% of the user's attack to enemy units within a large circular area and grants 2 stacks of [Deathrattle].

skills.name: Thunderous Quicksand Dance
skills.description: Gain a shield equal to 28%/31%/43% of your maximum health for 12 seconds, and release a ring of electric orbs that deal magic damage equal to 55%/60%/80% of your current health to enemy units in a large circular area. Inflicts [Shock] on hit. When equipped with a shield, the healing effect of [Illusory Dance] is increased by 50%.

skills.name: Elegy of the Ghostly Dance
skills.description: Whenever an allied unit is defeated, gain 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. During battle, each stack of [Deathrattle] increases own magic defense by 1.5%/2.5%/6% and evasion by 30/32/40.

skills.name: Drunken Dance of Shadows
skills.description: Spin and dance, granting yourself and allied units within a large circular area an [Dodge Up] and applying [Charm] for 5 seconds to enemy units within the area that have 5 or more stacks of [Drunken Fragrance].

skills.name: Drunken Dance and Dream Shadows
skills.description: [Drunken Dance of Shadows] has been changed to apply [Charm] for 8 seconds to enemy units within range that have 3 or more stacks of [Drunken Fragrance].

name: Drasill
title: Ancient Tree Guardian
lore: For a long time, Drasill the tree-man was asleep, and as a result, his body was covered with vines and mushrooms, but Drasill never thought of cleaning them up.

talent_levels.effect:
Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status, instantly recovering 26% of lost HP, and then recovering 3% of lost HP per second.
While in the [Wild] status, cannot move, gains immunity to control effect, and all basic attacks becomes ranged.
While in the [Wild] status, Overdrive Energy Cost is reduced by 2.
Boosts its Magic Defense by 23%.
Each time an ally unleashes an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. Each stack of [Awakening] increases Healing received by 4%.
While in the [Wild] status, each time [Awakening] is gained, dispels one debuff from self.

skills.name: Nature's Embrace
skills.description: Grants a shield equal to 19% of Max HP to all allies. Lasts 8 seconds.

skills.name: Vines
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 180% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area. Recovers 36% of lost HP on use.

skills.name: Root Juice
skills.description: When on the battlefield, allied Luminaries in the [Wild] status with a shield regenerate HP equal to 2% of their Max HP per second.

skills.name: Thorn Guardian
skills.description: While in the [Wild] status, after taking damage, deals magic damage equal to 3% of Max HP to the attacker.

name: Goren
title: Ancient Golem
lore: The colossal rock statues often encountered in ancient ruins usually lie dormant, appearing as ordinary rocks. However, if an enemy approaches, they will rise from the ground and smash their massive stone fists into the ground.

talent_levels.effect: The higher the Ancient Golem's HP percentage, the larger it grows, and the higher its Physical Defense becomes. However, its Attack Speed will also decrease. Its Physical Defense can increase by up to 45% and its Attack Speed can fall by 45%. When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, ignores HP percentage and always maintains maximum size.
[Crushing Summit] Inflicts 6 seconds of [Stun] after dealing damage to targets under an [Elemental Debuff].
Increases HP by 15%.
Grants Immunity to control effects when at maximum size.
Grants Immunity to [Physical Defense Down] and [Damage Reduction Down] when at maximum size.

skills.name: Crushing Summit
skills.description: Leaps into the air and strikes down at the earth, dealing physical damage equal to 28% of Max HP to enemies within a large circular area. After dealing damage, inflicts [Stun] for 3s. The range of this skill increases with the caster's size.

skills.name: Rocket Skull
skills.description:
Hurls a stone at a random allied Luminary, granting [Fervor] to allied units within a medium circular area around the target.
The range of this skill increases with the caster's size.

skills.name: Hardness
skills.description: Whenever casting a skill, gains a shield equal to 12% of Max HP and lasting for 8 seconds.

skills.name: Titanic Will
skills.description: When taking damage, has a 8% chance to gain [Fervor].

name: Gudong
title: Slime King
lore: If you think those bouncy, slimy creatures everywhere are just the go-to grinders for newbies to farm experienceâ€”you're sorely mistaken! Before you stands the slime of slimes, the king of kings, the eternal pinnacle of monster history in human games! *Gulp!*

talent_levels.effect: Upon death, summons three Small Slimes that inherit 20% of Attack, 20% of HP, and 100% of all other stats. Small Slimes last 20s.
For each enemy Luminary on the field with an Overdrive Energy cost of 4 or more, increases own Physical Defense by 6%.
Boosts Physical Defense by 23%.
Small Slimes have a 15% chance to inflict [Attack Down] after dealing damage.
When an enemy defeats a Small Slime, the Energy cost of their next Overdrive increases by 1.

skills.name: Cheep-Cheep
skills.description: Chirps, dealing physical damage to a single target equal to 320% of Attack and inflicting [Stun]. Lasts 5 seconds.

skills.name: Split
skills.description: Spawns 1 Small Slime every 16s. Up to a maximum of 3 summoned by this skill at a time.

skills.name: Slime Shield
skills.description: Upon defeat, leaves behind a puddle of Slime Goo that lasts for 5 seconds. Enemy units standing on Slime Goo have their Movement Speed reduced by 80% and Attack Speed reduced by 40%.

skills.name: Second Breath
skills.description: Gurgles, restoring 20% of Max HP.

name: Herman
title: King of Beasts
lore: The barbarian leader, formerly the daughter of the chieftain of the Fenris tribe, was sent to the Nibelgard Empire as a hostage after the failed rebellion. Due to her exceptional strength, she was selected to join the imperial army.
quote: Spirit of the Beast, fight by my side!

talent_levels.effect: Each time an ally releases an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. After releasing a skill, if at least 3 stacks of [Awakening] are present, consumes 3 stacks to unleash 3 Spirit Flames. During the duration of Spirit Flames, deals 80% of Attack as physical damage every 2s to enemy units within a medium circular area and restores 8% of Max HP to self. Spirit Flames last for 8s.
[Axe Boomerang] Increases the next Overdrive Energy Consumption by 1 for enemy units hit by 2 axes simultaneously.
Boosts Physical Defense by 23%.
While Spirit Fire is active, Overdrive Energy Consumption is reduced by 1 and Healing received is increased by 10%.
Spirit Fire damage and recovery frequency is changed to 1s.

skills.name: Savage Uproar
skills.description: Select a single target and roar at them, dealing physical damage equal to 450% of Attack. Additionally, enemies in a fan-shaped area in front of the caster take physical damage equal to 150% of Attack and are inflicted with [Attack Speed Down]. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When triggered, 3s of [Stun] is applied to a single target.

skills.name: Axe Boomerang
skills.description: Throws two axes forward and then recalls them. Each axe deals physical damage equal to 150% of the caster's Attack to enemy units it passes through, and only hits the same target once. Applies [Healing Down] to enemy units hit by both axes.

skills.name: Fearless Iron Bulwark
skills.description: When taking non-Overdrive Damage, increases own Damage Reduction by 16%.

skills.name: Flame Axe Judgement
skills.description: Leaps into the air and slams down on a single target, dealing physical damage equal to 230% of Attack and gaining a shield equal to 15% of Max HP. The shield lasts for 6s.

name: Oberonnie
title: Midsummer Night's Dreamer
lore: Living in the forest, she is the daughter of the Elf King, leading the elves with a serious and meticulous manner. She is methodical and rarely smiles. In battle, she always leads from the front, personally defending the peace of the forest.

talent_levels.effect:
Increases Dodge by 350.
When attacked by an enemy afflicted with an [Elemental Debuff], gains an additional 350 Dodge.
While in the [Wild] status, recovers HP equal to 4% of Max HP after each dodge.
Increases HP by 15%.
Upon entering the [Wild] status, instantly generates a Shield worth 20% of Max HP for 10 seconds.
When your team triggers an [Elemental Reaction], restores HP equal to 10% of Max HP. (triggers once every 5s max).

skills.name: Might of Mother Nature
skills.description: Summons two tornadoes that deal physical damage equal to 240% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area and inflict [Chill]. Gains a shield equal to 35% of Max HP, while also granting a shield equal to 30% of this amount to allied units within a large circular area, both lasting 8s.

skills.name: Shield Bash
skills.description: When shielded, Magic Defense increases by 44% and basic attacks deal AoE damage.

skills.name: Warden
skills.description:
Increases the effect of self-generated shields by 30%.
Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, shield effects increase by an additional 30%.

skills.name: Sylvan Solace
skills.description:
Grants allies within a large circular area [Magic Defense Up].
While in the [Wild] status, additionally grants a shield equal to 18% of Max HP. Lasts 8s.

talent_levels.effect: In battle, increases HP by 20%.
Upon entering the [Wild] status, grants [Fervor] to self and the nearest ally.
Boost Physical Defense by 18%.
While in the [Wild] status, [Ragecrash] additionally provides a Shield equal to 30% of Max HP.

skills.name: Ragecrash
skills.description: Sacrifices 25% of current HP to deal physical damage equal to 350% of Attack and launches enemies in a medium cone-shaped area into the air. Gains a shield equal to 39% of Max HP, lasting 8 seconds.

skills.name: Trample
skills.description: Deals physical damage equal to 160% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area. Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, additionally inflicts [Stun] on targets for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Will of the Centaur
skills.description: While in the [Wild] status, Physical Defense increases by 38%.

talent_levels.effect: In battle, increases Magic Defense by 22%. Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is att the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, Magic Defense increases by an additional 20%.
[Wildcry] Additionally grants [Morale] to self and the nearest ally unit.
Increases own Magic Defense by 15%.

skills.name: Shock 'n' Awe
skills.description: Smashes the ground, dealing physical damage equal to 420% of Attack to enemies in a medium cone-shaped area.

skills.name: Wildcry
skills.description:
Sacrifices 10% of current HP to grant allied units within a large circular area a shield equal to 27% of Max HP. Lasts 6 seconds.
This skill only activates once at the start of battle.

talent_levels.effect: In battle, increases Attack by 15%. Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Attack increases by an additional 1%.
Each time an ally uses an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. Each stack of [Awakening] increases Physical Defense by 4%.
Increases own PHysical Defense by 15%.

skills.name: Stinkstorm
skills.description: Releases poison gas, dealing magic damage equal to 450% of Attack to enemies in a medium cone-shaped area.

skills.name: Hop 'n' Chop
skills.description: Deals physical damage to a single target equal to 120% of Attack, and gains a shield equal to 12% of Max HP. Lasts 5 seconds.

talent_levels.effect: Increases Damage Reduction by 15%.

skills.name: Ironhide
skills.description: Grants a shield equal to 17% of Max HP. Lasts 6 seconds.

name: Hela
title: Goddess of Death
lore: Hela, the Queen of the Underworld, who governs death, disease, and aging. Due to a terrible prophecy brought about by her lineage, Odin, the king of the gods, banished her to Hel, the coldest and darkest realm of the underworld, and commanded her to rule this land of the dead, responsible for receiving all souls who did not die in honor of battle, but rather from old age or disease.

talent_levels.effect: After dealing damage with a basic attack, inflict the [Grim Reaper's Gaze] effect, lasting 6 seconds. When an allied Luminary deals damage to a target afflicted with [Grim Reaper's Gaze], it heals that target for 24% of the damage dealt + 4% of its own maximum HP , and grants the target one random [Blessing Buff]. (A [Blessing Buff] can trigger a maximum of once per target within 4 seconds.)
When [Soul-Hooking Scythe] hits, it applies [Damage Reduction Down] and additionally causes the nearest friendly ranged Luminary to also target the target, excluding itself.
If the enemy has at least 2 more surviving Luminaries than our side, then [Void Prison] will select an additional banished target.
[Void Prison] [Exile] duration increased to 8 seconds, and will never [Exile] itself.
Increases own health by 10% and skill haste by 10.
Increases own skill haste by 20.

skills.name: Void Prison
skills.description:
Banish yourself and the target for 5 seconds. After the banishment ends, deal true damage equal to 30% of the target's current health (up to a maximum of 300% of your maximum health). If the target cannot be banished, apply Damage Reduction to them and deal true damage equal to 40% of the target's current health (up to a maximum of 400% of your maximum health).
When the number of surviving Luminaries on your side is less than or equal to the number of surviving Luminaries on the enemy side, you will not be [Exile].

skills.name: Soul-Hooking Scythe
skills.description:
Throws a scythe at the furthest enemy Luminary within a straight line, dealing magic damage equal to 600% of the caster's attack and inflicting a 2- second stun. Then, pulls the target to the caster twice, dealing magic damage equal to 600% of the caster's attack each time. The caster and the nearest allied melee Luminary then target the target. This skill's cooldown is reset upon the target's death.
This skill is used once immediately at the start of the battle.

skills.name: Vision of the Dead
skills.description: [Grim Reaper's Gaze] additionally reduces the target's critical strike chance by 300 and damage increase by 20%. When Hela is present, when an allied unit deals damage to a target with [Grim Reaper's Gaze], its critical strike chance is increased by 300 and damage increase by 20%. If the allied unit is under the [Grace] status, it gains an additional 150 critical strike chance and 10% damage increase.

skills.name: Soul-Guiding Lamp
skills.description:
Throw a lantern at the ally with the lowest health (excluding itself), restoring 6% of its maximum health to allies within the lantern's range every second and granting 1 stack of [Deathrattle].
If the health of an allied Luminary is below 20% while the lantern is active, the lantern will be retrieved and the allied Luminary will be pulled to the user's side, granting it a shield equal to 80% of the user's maximum health for 10 seconds (this effect can trigger at most once within 15 seconds).
Whenever an allied unit is defeated, gain 1 stack of [Deathrattle].

skills.name: The Vision of the Corpses
skills.description: [Vision of the Dead] Reduces the target's critical damage by an additional 45%, and friendly units attacking the target gain an additional 45% critical damage.

name: Venus
title: Deity of Love
lore: Venus, the goddess of love and beauty, is "the grace of the gods".

talent_levels.effect: After casting a healing effect, grants the target [Divine Melody]: Increases Damage Reduction by 20.5%, plus an additional 20.5% when HP is less than or equal to 50%.
When our Luminary enters [Wild] status or triggers [Elemental Reaction], it receives healing, restoring 12% of its maximum Health. (Can trigger on the same target once every 5s)
[Heavensong] additionally removes all control effects and debuffs from all allied units, and grants them immunity to control effects for 3s.
The [Charm] duration of [Bewitchment] is increased by 6s. Before [Bewitchment] is triggered, the caster is immune to control effects and the [Next Overdrive Energy Consumption Increase] effect.
Increases Damage Reduction by 10% and HP by 10%.
Increases Damage Reduction by 20%.

skills.name: Heavensong
skills.description: [Equilibirum] Increases the HP of all allied units, then restores all allied units to 25% of their maximum HP. Whenever another allied Luminary is affected by [Stun] or [Silence], reduces the energy cost of the user's next ultimate skill by 1.

skills.name: Heart Seed
skills.description: Targets the allied Luminary with the lowest HP percentage, then heals allies within a large circular area around them for 21.5% of the caster's Max HP.

skills.name: Bewitchment
skills.description: When first hit by a melee Luminary, inflicts [Charm] on the attacker for 9.3s.

skills.name: Siren Strings
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 200% of Attack to enemies in a straight line and applies [Attack Speed Down], and additionally inflicts [Attack Down] on targets afflicted with an [Elemental Debuff].

skills.name: Love Heals Forever
skills.description: [Heavensong] Provides all allied Luminaries and Wyrms with a shield equal to 30% of their maximum health for 6 seconds.

name: Morgana
title: The Star Witch
lore: Morgana, a witch with the blood of British royalty. As the illegitimate eldest daughter of King Uther and the half-sister of King Arthur, she was secretly sent to the court library at a young age, where she studied ancient astronomy under the tutelage of the guardians. The magic flowing in her blood intertwined with her connection to the stars, quickly making her the court's sole astrologer. From the stars, she glimpsed fragments of civilization; inspired by the stars, she learned ancient astrological magic, and from that moment on, her destiny became inextricably linked to the celestial realm.

talent_levels.effect: During combat, Morgana gains 25% increased health. When an enemy unit is affected by a basic [Elemental Debuff], Morgana gains 1 stack of [Elemental Alchemy] of the corresponding color. When she has 6 stacks of [Elemental Alchemy] of the same color, she consumes them to apply the corresponding buff to all allied Luminaries. Red Elemental Alchemy: [Crit Up]; Yellow Elemental Alchemy: [Crit Damage Up]; Blue Elemental Alchemy: [Attack Boost].
Increases own damage reduction by 100% during the ultimate skill period.
Increases own health by 10% and healing effect by 4%.
When our party triggers an elemental reaction, the team recovers Arcane Points (8-second cooldown, can trigger a maximum of 3 times in the entire battle).
Gain an additional 10 points of maximum energy. When consuming [Elemental Alchemy], recover an additional 2 points of energy.

skills.name: Elemental Symphony
skills.description: Entering a 6-second channeled cast, during which time if an ally applies Burn or Shock, Morgana immediately applies Chill to the target (can trigger a maximum of once per target within 0.5 seconds). During the spellcasting period, every 1 second, the caster gains 4 random-colored [Elemental Alchemy] spells; when [Elemental Alchemy] is consumed, the caster recovers 5% of their health and launches a missile at the ally with the lowest health other than themselves, either a Luminary or a Wyrm, restoring it to 10% of the caster's maximum health.

skills.name: Illusory Water Star Mark
skills.description: Releases a water surge that deals magic damage equal to 450% of the caster's attack to enemy units within a medium circular area around the target location. Upon hit, it inflicts the [Chill] debuff and removes all [Reduced Energy Cost for Next Ultimate] effects from the target.

skills.name: Elemental Crucible
skills.description: It starts with a maximum of 10 energy points, gains full energy at the start of battle, and recovers 1 energy point when it consumes [Elemental Alchemy]. When an enemy Luminary is affected by Chill, it consumes some energy to additionally apply Healing Prohibition. If the target is already under Healing Prohibition, it will instead apply a random Attribute Debuff. When an enemy Luminary is affected by [Evaporation], it consumes 3 energy points to additionally add [Next Ultimate Skill Energy Cost +1].

skills.name: Water Circulation
skills.description: Cast a Water Ring on the ally with the lowest health (excluding itself) and on itself, lasting for 5 seconds. While the Water Ring is active, it increases the target's healing received by 20% and restores 6% of its maximum health to surrounding allies every second.

skills.name: Rhaspody
skills.description: [Elemental Symphony] When releasing a recovery bullet, release an additional one.

name: Ophelia
title: Holyblade Bishop
lore: She is the archbishop of the Holy Sword Gram Church, bearing the heavy responsibility of leading the congregation.
quote: Guarding the holy sword... is my duty.

talent_levels.effect: Every 10 seconds after the battle starts, grants [Sanctuary] to 1 random allied Luminary. Whenever [Sanctuary] is granted to an allied Luminary, additionally heals them for 11% of the caster's Max HP (can trigger on the same target a maximum of 1 time every 3 seconds).
Each time our side triggers the [Punishment] effect, the healing effect it applies is increased by 4%, stacking up to 10 times.
Increases HP by 10% and Critical Resistance by 50.
When casting [Radiant Sanctuary], if the target already has [Sanctuary], additionally applies [Fervor] to it.
While present, when our Luminary carries [Sanctuary], additional 30% Attack is increased.

skills.name: Radiant Sanctuary
skills.description: Grants [Sanctuary] to allies within a massive circular area, lasting 6s. If a target already possesses [Sanctuary], additionally grants them [Attack Boost].

skills.name: Divine Judgement
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 160% of Attack to enemies in a straight line and grants [Sanctuary] to the allied Luminary with the highest Attack. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] is triggered, damage increases by 40%. In addition, each time the [Punishment] effect is triggered, 1 random allied Luminary is granted [Sanctuary].

skills.name: Beatification
skills.description: In battle, HP increases by 8%. Whenever an ally triggers [Punishment], they gain [Sanctuary].

skills.name: Sacred Guard
skills.description: Summons a holy shield next to the allied Luminary with the lowest HP percentage. Every 3 seconds, it heals allies within a large circular area for 5.5% of the caster's Max HP. Disappears after triggering 3 times. When a holy shield is summoned, it grants the target Luminary [Fervor].

skills.name: Holy Will
skills.description: [Sacred Guard] Grants [Fervor] to allied Luminaries within a large circular area.

name: Scheherazade
title: Wishing Genie
lore: Legend has it that the ancient Sassanid king left behind a magic lamp, which, when lit, grants three wishes. When someone actually finds this lamp, the spirit he summons is a warm and cheerful woman who calls herself Scheherazade. However, although the spirit is eager to grant your wishes, she doesn't seem to be as omnipotent as the legends say...?

talent_levels.effect: All skill effects have a 40% chance to activate twice.
When healing a target under the [Grace] status, increases healing effect by 30%.
Increases HP by 5% and Skill Haste by 5%.
Additional increase of 20% probability for 2 activations.
All skill effects have an additional 30% chance to activate 3 times.

skills.name: Wish Granted
skills.description: Heals all allies for 23% of the caster's Max HP, with a 15% chance to grant [Morale] and [Fervor]. Each time an ally unleashes an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. When using this skill, consumes 4 stacks of [Awakening] to guarantee [Wish Fulfillment].

skills.name: Blessing
skills.description: Heals the allied Luminary with the lowest HP for 17% of the caster's Max HP.

skills.name: Gift of the Lamp
skills.description: Increases Damage Reduction by 15% for each stack of [Awakening].

skills.name: Blessed Boon
skills.description: Reduces the Energy cost of the next Overdrive unleashed by this unit and the allied Luminary with the highest current Overdrive Energy cost by 1.

skills.name: Shield of Willpower
skills.description: [Wish Granted] When the target is healed to full health, an additional shield equal to 15% of your maximum health is granted for 5 seconds.

name: Silbismo
title: The Fellowship of the Ring
lore: Silbimo has been wandering in the shattered land for a hundred years. She doesn't remember what happened in the past or where she is going. She is just a living shell. Until that day, the will of the Ring of Domination awakened in her consciousness like a spark, fully restoring her intellect and reminding her of her mission as the Ringbearer. She felt the Ring of Domination's callâ€”to guide the destined one to Him. From that moment on, her path had direction.

talent_levels.effect: When on the field, our summoned creatures deal additional damage equal to 45% of their attack with their basic attacks. This effect is increased by 30% for every 10% attack speed bonus that Spectrum has.
[Tentacle] attack, it additionally restores the same amount of HP to one allied Luminary in the [Wild] state.
Increases own health by 10% and attack speed by 4%.
[Touch of the Other Shore] has been changed to summon 2 [Tentacle]s.
[Ritual Soul-Splitting Coffin] has been changed to [Copy] the 4 friendly summons with the highest attack on the field.

skills.name: Ritual Soul-Splitting Coffin
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 72% of the target's current health to enemy units within a large circular area and inflicts [Attack Down] (damage not exceeding 144% of the user's maximum health). This effect increases by 20% for every 10% attack speed bonus that Spectrum possesses. Then, [Copy] the ally summon with the highest attack on the field.

skills.name: Touch of the Other Shore
skills.description: Summons one [Tentacle] to continuously attack enemy units (maximum of 4). Each basic attack deals 50% of the [Tentacle]'s attack as magic damage. Each time a [Tentacle] attacks, Specmo will additionally restore 4.1% of its maximum health to the ally with the lowest health. The [Tentacle] inherits 80% of Specmo's attack, 20% of its health, and 100% of its other attributes, as well as its current attack speed bonus, for 15 seconds. Whenever an allied unit is defeated, the user gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. When the user has [Deathrattle], each time the [Tentacle] attacks, it reduces its own stack of [Deathrattle] by 1 and provides 1 stack of [Deathrattle] to the target it is healing.

skills.name: Shadow Nourishment
skills.description: For each summoned creature that dies on our side, permanently increase your maximum health by 2% and attack speed by 4% for the rest of the battle, up to a maximum of 30 stacks.

skills.name: Nightfall Ring
skills.description: Grants [Crit Up] to all friendly units and all friendly summons within a large circular area around the user, and additionally applies [Adrenaline] to friendly Luminaries in the [Wild] state.

skills.name: Soul Rift Reversal
skills.description: [Ritual Soul-Splitting Coffin] Converts 25% of the damage dealt into healing for all allied units.

name: Titania
title: Fairy Queen
lore: Living by Lake Avalon, the gentle and maternal fairy queen is beloved for her boundless compassion and generosity towards her fairy subjects. She is captivating in appearance and possesses formidable magical abilities. Although composed, she occasionally indulges in mischievous pranks, playing small tricks on humans.

talent_levels.effect: When casting a skill to heal an ally, has a 25% chance to dispel 1 debuff from the target and additionally heal allies within a medium circular area around the target for 9% of the caster's Max HP. This effect is guaranteed to trigger when the target is in the [Wild] status.
After triggering [Redemption], the next Basic Attack randomly applies [Basic Elemental Debuff] Status to the target.
Increases own Magic Defense by 15% and HP by 5%.
Meteorfall Inflicts [Magic Defense Down] on targets hit that are under an [Elemental Debuff] status.
The dispel effect of [Redemption] has been changed from a single target to allies within a medium circular area around the target.

skills.name: Wish
skills.description: Unleashes blessed power, healing all allied Luminaries and Wyrms for 24% of the caster's Max HP.

skills.name: Stellar Surge
skills.description: Heals the allied Luminary or Wyrm with the lowest HP for 18% of the caster's Max HP.

skills.name: Radiance of Hope
skills.description: Each time [Redemption] is triggered, gains [Magic Defense Up] and increases own healing effects by 10% for 8 seconds. Cannot stack.

skills.name: Meteorfall
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 120% of Attack to the target and enemies within a medium circular area. When hitting enemies afflicted with an [Elemental Debuff], heals the ally Luminary or Wyrm with the lowest HP for 12% of the caster's Max HP.

skills.name: Primal Power
skills.description: [Wish] Additionally applies [Adrenaline] to targets in the [Wild] state (can trigger up to once per target within 30 seconds).

name: Vivienne
title: Lady of the Lake
lore: A water nymph in human form. She dwells in the heart of Lake Avalon, elusive and hard to find. Few have ever witnessed her dance or heard her song. Yet, afterwards, no amount of the world's most beautiful words could ever fully capture the boundless wonder of that time.
quote: Did you drop this sword into the water...?

talent_levels.effect: After the battle starts, possesses the allied Luminary with the highest Attack in the same column, granting a shield equal to 340% of the target's Attack and increasing its Attack by an amount equal to 35% of the Lady of the Lake's Attack (up to 100% of the target's Attack). During possession, the Lady is untargetable; when the shield is broken, the possession is lifted.
Each time possession is triggered, additionally grants the target [Fervor].
Increases Attack by 10% and Shield Effect by 4%.
While possessed, the target gains +15% Damage Reduction and becomes immune to control effects.
While possessed, when the target scores a kill, its Shield value is fully restored. (Can trigger once every 15s)

skills.name: Sacred Spring's Blessing
skills.description: Select an allied Luminary to possess, triggering the shield and Attack bonus effects of [Gleam of Refuge]. Additionally, restores HP equal to 260% of the caster's Attack plus 20% of the target's lost HP, and grants [Crit Damage Up]. If already possessing a target, changes the possession target or resets the shield for the current one.

skills.name: Cold Surge Water Bomb
skills.description: Launches a water bomb at the farthest enemy Luminary, dealing Magic Damage equal to 380% of own Attack to enemies within a medium circular area around the target and applies [Chill]. During possession, additionally heals the possessed target for 40% of the actual Damage dealt by this skill.

skills.name: Wellspring of Life
skills.description: During possession, every 10s, restores HP equal to 120% of Attack to allies within a large circular area. Each time the possessed target triggers an [Elemental Reaction], the healing effect is triggered once more.

skills.name: Luminous Flow Scatter
skills.description: Releases multiple water projectiles that strike random enemy units, each dealing magic damage equal to 125% of the caster's Attack. While possessing, also heals the possessed target for 40% of the actual damage dealt by this skill.

skills.name: Understanding Each Other
skills.description: [Gleam of Refuge] Increases the shield value provided by the possessed by 30%.

name: Atanith
title: Arcane Lord
lore: An elven mage who has dedicated her life to studying and practicing arcane magic, she possesses formidable combat prowess. Few can rival her in her understanding and manipulation of magical energy. Once the leader of a mage group, she has now resigned and travels the world, single-mindedly seeking the true essence of arcane magic.

talent_levels.effect: At the start of battle, increases the Overdrive Energy cost of the nearest enemy Luminary by 1 and reduces their Magic Defense by 20%. This effect is dispelled after the Arcane Lord is defeated.
The Healing effect of [Mana Surge] is increased by 30%.
Increases HP by 15%.
After the target of [Cursed Domain] is defeated, [Cursed Domain] is cast again on the nearest enemy Luminary.
[Cursed Domain] Changes to increase target's Overdrive Energy Consumption by 2.

skills.description:
Increases the Energy cost of the next Overdrive unleashed by any enemy Luminary by 1 and deals magic damage equal to 120% of Attack to all enemies.

skills.description: Deals magic damage to a single target equal to 210% of Attack and inflicting [Silence] for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Blade of Wisdom
skills.description: When on the battlefield, allies gain an additional 16% Life Steal when attacking targets in [Cursed Domain].

skills.name: The Source of Magical Power
skills.description: [Mana Surge] Selects an additional friendly Luminary with the lowest HP.

name: Caligula
title: Irongut Tyrant
lore: The ogre wizards, like other ogres, are not only lazy and gluttonous, but also possess the wisdom common to magesâ€”in their case, cunning.

talent_levels.effect: When casting healing effects, heals for an additional 5% of the target's lost HP.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Healing Increase by 2%.
Boosts Physical Defense by 23%.
[Sacred Blessing] Additionally grants the target a [Physical Defense Up].
While present, all allied Luminaries in [Wild] status have Damage Reduction increased by 20% when attacked by melee characters.

skills.name: Arcane Arts
skills.description: Summons a magic circle, granting allies within a large circular area [Adrenaline] and healing them for 700 + 18% of the caster's Max HP. Heals targets in the [Wild] status for an additional 50%. Grants 1 stack of [Deathrattle] when this skill's duration ends.

skills.name: Sacred Blessing
skills.description:
Grants a shield equal to 21% of Max HP to the allied Luminary with the lowest HP. Lasts 6 seconds.
When each allied Luminary first enters the [Wild] status, this skill is immediately cast on them.

skills.name: Unstable Amplification
skills.description: Increases Damage Reduction by 30% when attacked by melee characters.

skills.name: Ancestral Glory
skills.description: Summons 1 Totem. The totem heals the two allies with the lowest HP percentage for 7% of the caster's Max HP every 2.5s. The Totem inherits 50% of the caster's HP and is destroyed after healing 3 times.

skills.name: Priest's Whisper
skills.description: [Sacred Blessing] Selects an additional friendly Luminary with the lowest HP.

name: Chiron
title: Hero Mentor
lore: Compared to other centaurs, Chiron was not as warlike and brutal. She was said to be the offspring of a god, thus possessing a noble and powerful bloodline from birth. Chiron was proficient in music, chess, calligraphy, painting, archery, and swordsmanship; she was virtually omnipotent. Even learning just one skill from her would be enough for one to stand alone in a position of power.

talent_levels.effect: At the start of battle, grants the allied Luminary with the highest Attack a light orb. Each time this Luminary launches a skill or basic attack on an enemy, the orb fires a magic arrow, dealing magic damage equal to 90% of the Luminary's Attack. The orb disappears when the caster is defeated.
Whenever an ally Luminary gains a [Blessing Buff], reduces the Cooldown of [Pegasus Guard] by 1 second.
Increases HP by 15%.
[Battle Bond] When the target is in [Wild] status, additional 25% Attack Speed is increased.
[All or Nothing] Dispels all debuffs from the selected target.

In battle, increases HP by 10%.

skills.name: Heart of Guardian
skills.description: [Pegasus Guard] Grants an additional 15% Damage Reduction to both the caster and the target during its duration.

name: Flora
title: Spring Flower Spirit

[Showtime] additionally grants the target [Morale].
Increases HP by 12%.
[In Bloom] triggers once every 3 seconds.

[Healing Hands] After inflicting Damage, 75% chance to apply [Chill] to the target.

Increases Dodge by 300.

talent_levels.effect: In battle, increases HP by 15%.

skills.name: Whisperwind
skills.description: Heals a single target for 250 + 23% of the caster's Max HP.

name: Hades
title: Queen of the Underworld
lore: Hades, the king of the underworld, is the symbol of death and the netherworld, often referred to as "Zeus of the Underworld." He governs the underworld, death, and souls. His mission is to maintain order in the underworld and ensure that the soul of every deceased person receives a just rest and judgment.

talent_levels.effect: Attacks are not affected by Attack Speed. Cannot gain [Awakening]. Damage Amplification is increased by 20%. For every 4 stacks of [Awakening] gained by other allied Luminaries, Damage Amplification increases by an additional 10% and [Soul Chase] evolves once. Stacks up to 4 times.
Clones synchronize Energy points with Hades and inherit the [Soul Chase] effect.
When dealing damage for the first time, creates 1 Clone. When triggering [Elysium], immediately resets the Cooldown of [Final Verdict].
Clones are no longer restricted by Attack intervals.
Increases Crit Damage by 9% and Attack by 10%.
Increases Crit Damage by 18%.

skills.name: Final Verdict
skills.description: Creates 1 Clone at the current location (up to 3 can exist at the same time). Blinks to the front of a single target, dealing physical damage equal to 740% of Attack and knocking them down. If the target is defeated, this skill's cooldown is reset and 4 Overdrive Points are gained. Clone inherit 40% of Attack, cannot be targeted, and do not move on their own. If enemies are nearby, they perform basic attacks every 4.5s. Each time the caster uses an Overdrive, the Clone will move to the nearest enemy and launch a basic attack.

skills.name: Soul Chase
skills.description: Enhances basic attacks. Each evolution adds an additional instance of damage to basic attacks, up to a maximum of four instances. Each instance deals physical damage to a single target equal to 160% of Attack. The fourth instance deals double damage.

skills.name: Ruthless Hunter
skills.description: When attacking, damage increases based on the target's lost HP percentage. For every 1% of HP lost, Damage Amplification increases by 0.4%.

skills.name: Elysium
skills.description: Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Attack increases by 1%. Consumes 0/7 stacks of [Deathrattle] to gain immunity to the first/second instance of fatal damage received, and dispels all debuffs and control effects. Flies toward and absorbs each Clone on the battlefield in sequence, recovering 25% of Max HP for each Clone absorbed, and deals physical damage equal to 230% of Attack to enemies encountered along the way (Cannot be triggered if there are not enough [Deathrattle] stacks or no Clones on the field).

skills.name: The Remnant Soul of Hades
skills.description: [Final Verdict] All clones inherit an additional 30% attack.

name: Jormungandr
title: World Serpent
lore: A mysterious girl with a cold expression and few words, she always acts alone, and no one knows her purpose.
quote: Only food and power are worth pursuing!

talent_levels.effect:
Every 9 seconds, deals physical damage to the current target equal to 50% of Attack + 35% of the target's lost HP (damage from lost HP cannot exceed 350% of Attack).
When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, this skill's damage increases to 50% of Attack + 70% of the target's lost HP (damage from lost HP cannot exceed 700% of Attack).
After [Ravaging Maw] Crits, reduces the Cooldown of all skills by 2 seconds.
Increases Attack by 10% and Crit by 50.
When scoring a kill, grants [Morale] to self and 2 random allied Luminaries (prioritizes Sanctum Glory faction members).
[Ravaging Maw] Changed to trigger once every 6 seconds.

skills.name: Titancoil Domain
skills.description: After selecting a target, launches them into the air, and deals physical damage equal to 410% of Attack. After this, deals physical damage equal to 240% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area around the target, and additionally deals 2x the damage of [Ravaging Maw] to the selected target.

skills.name: Venombrand
skills.description: Fiercely whips forward, dealing physical damage equal to 150% of Attack to enemies in a straight line. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] is triggered, deals additional damage equal to 0.8x the damage of [Ravaging Maw] and applies [Healing Down].

skills.name: Chaos Banquet
skills.description: In battle, increases Attack by 8%. When unleashing an Overdrive or triggering the [Punishment] effect, gains [Morale].

skills.name: Bladescale Dance
skills.description: Pummels a single target, dealing physical damage equal to 320% of Attack and inflicting [Physical Defense Down].

skills.name: Ten Thousand Snakes Eat Bones
skills.description: [Ravaging Maw] After defeating the target, immediately use [Ravaging Maw] again on the enemy Luminary with the lowest health.

name: Lilith
title: Queen of Eternal Night
lore:
"Lilith, originating from the spirit of the night in Mesopotamia, is the first woman created by the gods in Hebrew legend, and the queen who rules the night."
First, she uttered the unspeakable true name of the god. Then, under the god's gaze, she leaped from Eden and plunged into the legendary, ever-churning Red Sea. From that moment on, she had her own name â€” Lilith.

talent_levels.effect:
Lilith possesses a longer attack range than typical melee Luminaries (but is still classified as a melee Luminary). When her skills deal damage, there is a 50% chance to inflict the [Echoes of Pain] debuff on the target, lasting 8 seconds and cannot stack. This chance increases by 3% for every 10% reduction in the target's healing received.
After other allied Luminaries deal damage to enemy units with [Echoes of Pain] through their basic attacks or active skills, Lilith will deal additional magic damage equal to [actual damage value] * 310% to all enemy units with [Echoes of Pain] (this damage will not trigger critical hits, dodges, or blocks).
[Song of Destruction] deals damage to each target with [Echoes of Pain], and restores health equal to 20% of attack and 5% rage to the caster.
Increases own HP by 10% and HP conversion by 4%.
[Shadow Blade Dance] can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When the [Punishment] effect is triggered, the target's ultimate skill cooldown is increased by an additional 2 seconds.
When an allied Luminary in the [Wild] state deals damage to an enemy unit with [Echoes of Pain] using its basic attack or active skill, it gains 50% increased damage.

skills.name: Song of Destruction
skills.description: Deals 340% of the caster's attack as magic damage three times to enemy units in a fan-shaped area. Also inflicts an additional 4 seconds of silence on targets already afflicted with [Echoes of Pain].

skills.name: Shadow Blade Dance
skills.description:
Fires a magic missile at each enemy unit within a large circular area, dealing magic damage equal to 280% of the caster's attack and increasing the target's ultimate skill cooldown by 2 seconds. At the start of battle, immediately teleports to the center of the enemy team (the teleportation effect ignores enemy guards) and casts this skill once.
When your own health decreases, you will accumulate rage. When your rage is full, you will enter the [Wild] state. While in the [Wild] state, [Shadow Blade Dance] will fire an additional magic missile at each target. The damage of the additional magic missile is increased to 420% of your own attack , but it will not increase the cooldown of the target's ultimate skill.

skills.name: Energy-Absorbing Twin Blades
skills.description:
When our Luminary steals attributes from an enemy unit, it increases its own HP conversion by 3% , lasting until the end of the battle, and can be triggered 20 times.
When our Luminary triggers [Punishment], it inflicts [Healing Down] on the target.

skills.name: Nightmare Plunder
skills.description: When [Echoes of Pain] is applied, it steals an additional 2.4% of the target's attack (cannot be applied to bosses), lasting for 8 seconds and stacking up to 5 times.

skills.name: Shadow Blade Dance
skills.description: When [Shadow Blade Dance] deals damage, it also inflicts [Attack Down] and [Crit Down].

name: Mordred
title: Death Knight
lore: She was born under a curse, branded as an unfaithful child from the day she was born.

talent_levels.effect: Launches a water bomb at the farthest enemy Luminary, dealing Magic Damage equal to 10% of own Attack to enemies within a medium circular area around the target and applies [Chill]. During possession, additionally heals the possessed target for 40% of the actual Damage dealt by this skill.
After triggering [Elemental Reactions], reduces the Cooldown of [Mourning Edge Devour] and [Devour Wheel] by 4s.
Increases Attack by 10% and Haste by 3.
[Soul Sacrifice Annihilation] increases the maximum number of summonable units that can be sacrificed by 1. Each sacrificed unit also grants 1 additional stack of [Deathrattle].
Dispel chance increases to 100%. When having at least 6 stacks of [Deathrattle], it dispels all Buff statuses from the target instead.

skills.name: Soul Sacrifice Annihilation
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 660% of Attack to enemies in a straight line and grants 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. Sacrifices up to 2 non-elite summons when cast (prioritizing those with lower Attack). Each sacrifice increases this skill's damage by 25%. Becomes untargetable while casting. After the skill ends, automatically attacks the nearest enemy unit.

skills.name: Mourning Edge Devouor
skills.description: Slash at a single target with a scythe, dealing magic damage equal to 510% of Attack. Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], this skill's damage is increased by 3%.

skills.name: Flaw Execution
skills.description: Increases damage dealt by 33% when attacking unbuffed enemies.

skills.name: Devour Wheel
skills.description: Spins the scythe to deal magic damage equal to 280% of Attack to enemies in a large circular area. Against targets afflicted with an [Elemental Debuff], Life Steal is increased by 75%.

skills.name: Elegy for the Underworld
skills.description: [Soul Sacrifice Annihilation] The damage increase after sacrificing each non-elite summon has been increased from 25% to 35%.

name: Pan Junbao
title: Taichi Master
lore: He embodies the unity of knowledge and action, traversing mountains and rivers. The people of Illusion Mountain may occasionally catch a glimpse of this kung fu master, perhaps in the dangerous Demon Realm, or perhaps in a bustling city square. The black and white panda man is hard to miss, but soon he will vanish without a trace.
quote: Manifest the universe, unite with the qi.

talent_levels.effect: Increases Attack Speed by 24% and Crit by 240. At the start of battle, floats before a target and applies a 5-second [Taunt] effect.
[Showstopper Smash] can trigger the [Punishment] effect. Applies [Taunt] for 10 seconds when the [Punishment] effect is triggered.
Increases own Attack by 10% and HP by 5%.

[Featherweight Force] During the charge-up period, increases Damage Immunity by 80% and grants General Immunity (Control). Each time it Intercepts a ranged Basic Attack, increases this skill's damage by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.
While in the [Wild] status, the Attack Speed and Crit bonus effects of [Serenity] are doubled.

skills.name: Showstopper Smash
skills.description: Quickly darts in front of a single target, applying a 5-second [Taunt] effect and dealing physical damage equal to 800% of Attack.

skills.name: Featherweight Force
skills.description: Begins charging power, intercepting ranged basic attacks within a medium circular area for 2 seconds. After 2 seconds, deals physical damage equal to 295% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area.

skills.name: Fluidity
skills.description: Each basic attack consumes 5% of current HP and steals 2% of the target's Attack for 6 seconds (doesn't affect bosses). This steal effect can stack up to 10 times.

skills.name: Flowing Fist
skills.description: Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, Life Steal increases by 15%, and basic attacks are replaced with 5 Flowing Fist moves that no longer consume HP. Each move deals physical damage equal to 100% of Attack.

name: Rin
title: The Peerless Swordsman
lore: Rin was born into a family of swordsmen and was renowned for his dual-wielding technique. He fought over sixty battles without ever being defeated, and once even defeated a powerful enemy using only a wooden sword. Rin is known throughout the world as a master swordsman, leaving behind numerous legendary tales.

talent_levels.effect: Whenever an allied unit is defeated, gain 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. When a skill deals a critical hit, it grants [Morale] to the user and one allied Luminary of the Holy Glory faction with the highest attack. When the [Sword Clone] basic attack deals a critical hit, it grants one stack of [Deathrattle] to the user and one allied Luminary of the Otherworldly Descent faction with the highest attack. During battle, increases own evasion by 300/350/400/450/500/550/600. For each stack of [Deathrattle], increases own evasion by an additional 30/35/40/45/50/55/60.
When in the [Grace] state, the shield value provided by energy is doubled.
Increases attack by 10% and critical hit chance by 50%.
When applying [Morale] or [Deathrattle] with [Niten Ichiryu], select an additional target.
Each time [Phantom Martial Soul] is released, the [Increased Energy Cost for Next Ultimate Skill] effect is removed. When [Swallow Return] deals damage, [Two Heavens Imprint] is applied.

skills.name: Swallow Return
skills.description: She instantly slashes twice at enemy units within a rectangular area, dealing physical damage equal to 650%/715%/780%/845%/910%/975% of her attack respectively, and applying a pulling effect twice to a single target at the end of each slash. The user is untargetable during the skill's activation.

skills.name: Phantom Martial Soul
skills.description: The effect of releasing it varies depending on whether there is a [Sword Clone] on the field. When no [Sword Clone] exists, summon a [Sword Clone] (maximum 1 can exist on the field) and then retreat. When the [Sword Clone] is created, it applies a 3-second Taunt to enemy units within a large circular area, while the clone becomes untargetable for 3 seconds. The [Sword Clone] inherits 75%/80%/85%/90%/95%/100% of the clone's current evasion value and 100% of other attributes and possesses the skill Shadowfall. When the [Sword Clone] uses a basic attack, it applies the [Two Heavens Imprint] to the target. When a [Sword Clone] exists, rush towards it and absorb it, restoring 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%/55% of your maximum health and gaining [Dodge Up].

skills.name: Swift Blade Shadow
skills.description: When there is no [Sword Clone] on the field, each time you gain a [Blessing Buff] status, reduce the cooldown of [Phantom Martial Soul] by 5 seconds. When a [Sword Clone] exists on the field, each time you gain [Deathrattle], the [Sword Clone] also gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle] and you and the [Sword Clone] gain 1 stack of [Blade Shadow], each stack increasing attack speed by 10%/11%/12%/13%/14%/15%.

skills.name: Shadowfall from the Sky
skills.description: After leaping up, unleash a slash that deals physical damage equal to 630%/690%/750%/810%/870% of the user's attack to enemy units within a large circular area , and grants the user a shield equal to 160%/175%/190%/205%/220% of their attack for 6 seconds. When a user possesses both Morale and Fighting Spirit, they enter the Grace state. While in the Grace state, the user inflicts Hit Rate Reduction and Physical Defense Reduction on the target.

skills.name: Path of the Gale
skills.description: [Swift Blade Shadow] When there are no [Sword Clone] on the field, each time you gain a [Blessing Buff], the cooldown of [Phantom Martial Soul] is reduced by an additional 5 seconds.

name: White Tiger
title: Four Saints
lore: A beast-tailed girl from a mysterious ancient kingdom in the far east, she appears energetic and innocent, loves to eat and fight, but her true form is the White Tiger God who guards the west, a powerful and all-powerful being. She only takes on the form of a girl for certain reasons and travels the world.

talent_levels.effect: Cannot deal critical hits. Every third basic attack deals physical damage equal to 230% of Attack to the target and enemies in a medium cone-shaped area behind them.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Attack increases by 1.5%.
Increases Attack by 10% and Attack Speed by 3%.
When casting [Soaring Tempest], dispels all debuffs from self and gains [Attack Boost].
While in the [Wild] status, gains immunity to [Stat Reduction] status.

skills.name: Soaring Tempest
skills.description: Sacrifices 30% of current HP to unleash a flurry of strikes on a single target, dealing physical damage equal to 910% of Attack in total. The final blow deals physical damage equal to 120% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area. Life Steal increases by an additional 50% for this skill's duration.

skills.name: Cyclone Kick
skills.description: Leaps behind the target to deal physical damage to enemies within a large cone-shaped area equal to 320% of Attack.

skills.name: Infinity Combo
skills.description: Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, Attack increases by 10%. Basic attacks are supercharged to [Infinity Combo], and each [Infinity Combo] triggers the AoE damage of [Kickstorm].

skills.name: Soulshaker
skills.description: All attacks ignore 15% of the target's Physical Defense. When not afflicted with a debuff, this effect is doubled. (This defense-ignoring effect can stack up to 40%.)

skills.name: A Normal Punch
skills.description: [Cyclone Kick] Consumes an additional 10% of current health to gain [Damage Boost].

name: Zagrus
title: Princess of the Underworld
lore: Zagreus was the daughter of Hades, the god of the underworld. Hades received a prophecy at Zagreus's birth: this princess of the underworld was destined to die and then be reincarnated as a god. Hades did not want his daughter to experience the pain of death, so he protected her strictly and even forbade her to leave the underworld.

talent_levels.effect: When you apply the [Chill] effect to yourself or deal damage to an enemy unit that is under the [Chill] or [Evaporation] status, you will deal additional magic damage equal to 430% of your attack to the target and inflict [Freeze] for 4 seconds (this effect can trigger at most once per target within 8 seconds). Enemies in the [Freeze] state will have their base rage regeneration efficiency reduced by 60%.
Each time you apply [Freeze] to an enemy unit, reduce the cooldown of [Instant Shadow Slash] by 4 seconds.
Increases own attack by 10% and accuracy by 50.
Whenever an ally triggers an [Elemental Reaction], the cost of the user's next Ultimate Skill is reduced by 1 (can trigger at most once within 2 seconds).
The duration of [Freeze] is extended to 6 seconds, and enemies under the [Freeze] status will have their base rage recovery efficiency reduced by 100%.

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: Blink to the target location and unleash a blizzard that deals 10 instances of magic damage equal to 52% of the caster's attack to enemy units in a large circular area. Each instance of damage has a 5% chance to inflict the [Chill] debuff. For each ultimate skill cast by an ally, the caster gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. For each stack of [Awakening] the caster has, the chance increases by an additional 1%.

skills.name: Frozen Moment
skills.description: Summons an ice projectile that deals magic damage equal to 390% of the caster's attack to a single target and inflicts the [Chill] debuff.

skills.name: Sharp Sword Edge
skills.description: During battle, increases own attack by 10%. Attacks against enemy units that are in the [Freeze] state are increased by an additional 40%.

skills.name: Instant Shadow Slash
skills.description: Performs several slashes on a single target, dealing a total of 680% of the caster's attack as magic damage. The caster is untargetable during the skill's duration.

skills.name: Netherworld Snow
skills.description: When [Blizzard] is cast, it inflicts [Magic Defense Down] and [Attack Speed Down] on enemy units within its range.

name: Fenrir
title: Night Huntress
lore: A elusive humanoid beast, appearing silently in the night, swiftly delivering a fatal blow to its enemies with its agile claws before vanishing without a trace. Living entirely in nature, nocturnal and free-spirited, hunting is its greatest passion.
quote: I can't lend you my claws, meow~

talent_levels.effect: When there is at least 1 enemy on the battlefield with less than 50% HP, Life Steal increases by 25%. [Hunting Time] This skill's cooldown resets if the target is defeated.
Each time an ally unleashes an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. For each stack of [Awakening], Life Steal is increased by an additional 4%.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
After triggering [Elemental Reactions], gains [Attack Boost].
[Hunting Time] Gains 2 Overdrive Points after defeating a target.

skills.name: Hunting Time
skills.description: Quickly darts in front of a single target, dealing physical damage equal to 430% of Attack and knocking them down. If the target is defeated, deals additional physical damage equal to 129% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area. Crit increases by 1,200 for this skill's duration.

skills.name: Furious Flurry
skills.description: Gathers strength to gain [Crit Damage Up], then unleashes three rounds of consecutive strikes. Each round of blows deals physical damage to a single target equal to 155% of Attack.

skills.name: Predatory Pulse
skills.description:
At the start of battle and every 12 seconds thereafter, the next instance of damage inflicted deals additional physical damage equal to 80% of Attack and inflicts [Shock].
Upon using [Hunting Time], immediately gains this effect.

skills.name: Secret Raid
skills.description: Quickly passes through a single target, dealing physical damage equal to 275% of Attack.

skills.name: Gale Dance
