skills.description: [Furious Flurry] grants [Attack Speed Boost] immediately upon activation.

name: Lancelot
title: Knight of the Lake
lore: Raised by the Lake Fairy, the knight is warm, cheerful, helpful, and possesses a strong sense of justice and a pure heart; she is also known as the "Knight of the Lake." Her behavior perfectly embodies the spirit of chivalry. As King Arthur's close friend and the most well-known Knight of the Round Table, she has always fought valiantly to protect Camelot.
quote: In the name of the sun!

talent_levels.effect: The farther the total distance moved this battle, the higher Damage Amplification becomes, up to a maximum increase of 40%.
[Solar Steed] Inflicts [Shock] on enemy units it collides with.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
Each time self triggers an [Elemental Reaction], reduces the Cooldown of [Solar Steed] by 2 seconds.
While in the [Grace] status, the damage bonus of [Long March] is doubled.

skills.name: Solar Steed
skills.description: Gains [Morale], then charges at a single target, dealing physical damage equal to 110% of Attack to enemies along the way. After this, deals physical damage equal to 220% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area around the target.

skills.name: Piercing Gale
skills.description: Unleashes a flurry of consecutive thrusts at enemies in a medium cone-shaped area, dealing physical damage equal to 225% of Attack in total.

skills.name: Chivalry
skills.description:
Increases Crit by 350.
When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, each critical hit reduces the cooldown of [Solar Steed] by 1 second.

skills.name: Lightwall
skills.description: Upon entering the [Grace] status, instantly dispels all debuffs from self and reduces the cooldown of [Solar Steed] by 14s.

name: Nemesis
title: Goddess of Vengeance
lore: The Furies, the goddesses of Olympus, ruthlessly and mercilessly judge all lawbreakers. They can always ignite the fighting spirit of wounded or weary warriors with hatred. They are also a symbol of judgment and punishment, offering righteous redemption to those who have suffered injustice.

talent_levels.effect: After unleashing an Overdrive, the next 6 attacks increase Attack Speed by 80%.
[Silent Scream] When triggering [Punishment], inflicts [Silence] for 6 seconds.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
Each time [Crippling Strike] is cast, reduces the Cooldown of [Silent Scream] by 2 seconds.
After [Silent Scream] triggers the [Punishment] effect, gains 2 Overdrive Points.

skills.name: Silent Scream
skills.description: Blinks to the back of a single target and deals physical damage equal to 380% of Attack. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] is triggered, Crit Damage increases by 50% for this skill's duration.

skills.name: Crippling Strike
skills.description: Throws poison darts at the 2 enemy Luminaries with the highest current Overdrive Energy cost, each dealing physical damage equal to 120% of Attack.

skills.name: Ambush
skills.description: Each time an ally releases an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. When possessing at least 2 stacks of [Awakening], immediately consumes 2 stacks of [Awakening] to launch a supercharged [Crippling Strike]: Deals additional physical damage equal to 30% of the caster's Attack, and changes from single target to large circular AoE damage.

skills.name: Warlust
skills.description: Crit increases by 600 when attacking enemies with an Overdrive Energy cost of 4 or more.

talent_levels.effect: Basic attacks have a 30% chance to become supercharged, dealing 120% physical damage to enemies within a medium circular area.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Attack increases by 1%.
Increases Attack by 12%.
Attack is increased by 30% when attacking enemies with an [Elemental Debuff].

skills.name: Ruthless Hunt
skills.description: Charges at a single target, inflicting [Shock] and dealing physical damage equal to 460% of Attack. If the target is defeated in the course of the charge, immediately changes target, dealing physical damage equal to 368% of Attack to the new charge target. This can happen up to 6 times.

skills.name: Apex Predator
skills.description: Dashes to the back of a single target, inflicting [Physical Defense Down] and dealing physical damage equal to 90% of Attack to enemies along the way.

skills.name: Shadow Arts
skills.description:
Increases Attack Speed by 10%.
In battle, increases Attack by 10%.

talent_levels.effect: The Boar Knight gets serious, increasing Attack Speed by 80% for the next 3 basic attacks. The third basic attack deals additional physical damage equal to 60% of Attack.
Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, Overdrive Energy Cost is reduced by 1.
Increases Attack by 10%.

skills.name: Wild Charge
skills.description: Charges at a single target, dealing physical damage equal to 480% Attack. Also deals physical damage equal to 130% of Attack to enemies along the way.

skills.name: Space Cadet
skills.description: The Boar Knight eases up, dealing physical damage equal to 330% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area, and reducing the Energy cost of the next Overdrive by 1.

talent_levels.effect: Increases Dodge by 420. For each enemy Luminary on the battlefield with an Overdrive Energy cost of 4 or more, Dodge increases by an additional 50.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Attack increases by 1%.
Increases Attack by 10%.

skills.name: Final Thrust
skills.description: Deals physical damage to a single target equal to 520% of Attack. If the target is marked with [Bouncing Blade], deals additional physical damage equal to 25% of the target's lost HP, up to a maximum of 375% of Attack.

skills.name: Bouncing Blade
skills.description: Throws a dagger that deals physical damage equal to 110% of Attack to a single target, then bounces to other enemies up to 2 times. Luminaries hit by this skill will be marked for 6 seconds.

talent_levels.effect: Increases Crit by 225.

skills.name: Shadowstrike
skills.description: Deals physical damage to a single target equal to 370% of Attack.

name: Ares
title: Goddess of War
lore: Ares, son of Zeus and Hera, is the god of war, the embodiment of war.

talent_levels.effect:
Basic attacks deal additional physical AoE damage equal to 16% of Max HP.
Each time a basic attack deals damage or when taking basic attack damage, gains 5% Energy. When at full Energy, [Godfist] and [Focused Fist] become supercharged.
[Deathless Domination] Resets the cooldown of [Godfist] after being triggered and reduces the Energy cost of this unit's next Overdrive by 1.
[Deathless Domination] can trigger 2 times. Whenever an ally triggers the [Punishment] effect, self gains 20% Energy.
Gain 50% Energy at the start of combat. When at full Energy, gain +750 Critical Hit and +750 Break.
Increases own HP and Life Steal by 10%.
Increases Life Steal by 20%.

skills.name: Godfist
skills.description: Flexes both arms into a frenzied fit, pummeling forward and dealing physical damage equal to 600% of Attack to enemy units in a medium rectangular area while knocking them back. When at full Energy, deals additional physical damage equal to 44% of Max HP. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] is triggered, this additional damage is doubled and inflicts a 4s [Stun] on targets affected by [Punishment].

skills.name: Focused Fist
skills.description:
Unleashes a forceful fist forward to tear through enemies within a cone-shaped area, dealing physical damage equal to 190% of Attack. Deals additional physical damage equal to 19% of Max HP to enemies in the center of this area.
This skill deals more damage when possessing more Energy, up to a maximum of 100% increased damage. When at full Energy, additionally grants a shield equal to 30% of Max HP, lasting 6 seconds.

skills.name: Seismic Soul
skills.description:
When attacking enemies under control effects, increases damage dealt by 40%.
Each time an ally casts an Overdrive, the caster gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. When the caster has at least 3 stacks of [Awakening], all 3 stacks are consumed to empower the next normal attack: slamming a single target to deal 240% of the caster's Attack as Physical Damage and inflicting [Stun] for 4s.

skills.name: Deathless Domination
skills.description:
Upon taking fatal damage for the first time, becomes briefly Invincible and inflicts [Time Stasis] on enemies within a large circular area for 5s.
Then begins consuming Energy, restoring 10% of Max HP for every 10% Energy consumed, up to full HP. Energy will no longer be consumed once HP is fully restored.

skills.name: High Spirits
skills.description: [Focused Fist] Grants a shield without needing full energy.

name: Thor
title: Goddess of Thunder
lore: As one of the chief gods of the Aesir, Thor is not only the most powerful and charismatic of the Norse gods, but also the only one always ready to fight the giants. As Odin's son, she voluntarily took on the responsibility of protecting Asgard.

talent_levels.effect:
Whenever you apply [Shock] to an enemy unit, there is a 50% chance to apply 1 stack of [Thor's Mark] to the target.
The [Thor's Mark] can stack up to 5 times and can be detonated by the user's ultimate skill. Each time a [Thor's Mark] is detonated, it deals magic damage equal to 320% of the user's attack to enemy units within a large circular area around the target.
[Divine Hammer Strike] has been changed to grant the user [Morale] and [Fervor] upon successfully stunning the target.
Each time you apply [Thor's Mark], you gain a shield equal to 6% of your maximum health, which can stack up to 10 times and lasts for 6 seconds.
When present, if our party triggers an [Elemental Reaction], apply 1 stack of [Thor's Mark] to the affected target.
Increases own HP by 8% and Dodge by 120.
Increases own Dodge by 200.

skills.name: Thunder Prison Judgment
skills.description:
Raise the hammer into the air and unleash a series of lightning strikes on surrounding enemies. Each strike deals 49% of the caster's attack as magic damage and applies up to 3 instances of [Shock] to each target.
Upon landing, the user deals 405% of their attack as magic damage to enemy units within a large circular area and detonates all [Thor's Mark] within the area. During the skill's duration, the user is immune to crowd control effects.

skills.name: Divine Hammer Strike
skills.description: Throw the lightning hammer in a straight line and retrieve it. When thrown and retrieved, it deals magic damage equal to 180% of the user's attack to enemy units along its path. When retrieved, it additionally pulls the first enemy unit it collides with towards the user by 20% and applies a 4-second [Stun]. If the [Stun] is successfully applied, the user gains [Morale]. Released once immediately at the start of the battle.

skills.name: Elemental Grace
skills.description:
While present, whenever an allied Luminary triggers an Elemental Reaction, apply one random Blessing buff to it (prioritizing the one it doesn't currently have).
When you gain both [Morale] and [Fervor], you enter the Grace state. While in the Grace state, you gain the skill Lightning Strike: Hammers enemy units in a large circular area in front of you, dealing 360% of your attack as magic damage in two hits and applying 2 stacks of Electrocution. The base cooldown is 6 seconds. This skill also has a 100% health conversion effect when it deals damage.

skills.name: Thunderous Dance
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 180% of the user's attack to enemy units in a fan-shaped area in front of the user and applies 1 stack of [Shock]. Targets with 2 or more stacks of [Thor's Mark] will also be stunned for 0.1 seconds.

skills.name: Divine Hammer Breaker
skills.description: [Divine Hammer Strike] When it returns, it applies a 20% pull and a 4-second [Stun] to all enemy units it collides with.

name: Andevaly
title: Wings of Judgment
lore: The black dragon Andvari was born from the ashes of Ragnarok and is one of the very few dragons that were not corrupted by the source poison. In that cataclysmic destruction, the black dragons followed Nidhogg in their battle against the gods, ultimately nearly perishing. After the calamity, their mother found an ancient city as her nest, sheltering the last remaining bloodline of the black dragons. Those were Andvari's only peaceful timesâ€”her mother's wings protected her from the chaos of the outside world.

talent_levels.effect: When an enemy character is knocked back or launched into the air, Andvari grants herself a shield equal to 4.5% of her maximum health for 6 seconds, which can stack up to 20 times. Whenever another allied Luminary triggers [Punishment], Andvari grants it a shield equal to 20% of its current shield amount for 6 seconds (this effect can be triggered at most once within 3 seconds for the same allied Luminary).
For every 10 shields gained, the energy cost of your next ultimate skill is reduced by 1.
Increases own magic defense by 15% and shield effect by 4%.
When [Path-Sweeping Sweep] triggers the [Punishment] effect, it additionally applies [Attack Down]. When [Dragon's Descent] is released, the cooldown of [Path-Sweeping Sweep] is refreshed.

Reduces the cooldown of [Dragon's Descent] by 1 second when a shield is gained (can trigger at most once within 0.5 seconds). [Dragon's Descent] is now changed to provide [Damage Boost] to all allied units.

skills.name: Dragon's Descent
skills.description: Leap into the air above the target, then drop vertically towards it, dealing 184% of your attack as physical damage and knocking up enemy units in a super-large circular area. Then sweep across the area, dealing 552% of your attack as physical damage to enemy units in a super-large circular area, while also granting allied units in the super-large circular area the [Damage Boost].

skills.name: Path-Sweeping Sweep
skills.description: Deals physical damage equal to 430% of the user's attack to enemy units in a semi-circular area in front of the user. This skill can trigger [Punishment], which knocks the target back a short distance. Each time our side uses an ultimate skill, we gain 1 stack of [Awakening]. Each stack of [Awakening] increases the damage of this skill by 25%.

skills.name: Activating Scales
skills.description: Each time you gain a shield, you gain an additional stack of [Black Dragon Claw]. Each stack of [Black Dragon Claw] increases your attack by 10% and ultimate skill damage by 10%.

skills.name: Dragon Fang Pierce
skills.description: Throw a spear at the enemy Luminary with the lowest current ultimate skill energy consumption, dealing physical damage equal to 380% of your attack power to enemy units within a large circular area around the target, and increasing the ultimate skill energy consumption of the damaged enemy Luminary by 1 for the next ultimate skill.

skills.name: Hardened Scales
skills.description: [Activating Scales] While the shield is active, the user gains an additional 15% increased damage and 25% reduced damage.

name: Arthur
title: Eternal King
lore: Daughter of King Uther, the great and immortal Queen of Camelot, she was dashing and spirited, charming and debonair, upright and honorable, and possessed a strong sense of chivalry, earning her countless admirers and respect. The sorcerer Merlin was her companion and mentor, and many upright knights gathered around the queen, forming the Knights of the Round Table, a order without hierarchical distinctions of rank or subject, working together to contribute to the prosperity of Camelot.

talent_levels.effect: Whenever obtaining [Fervor], gains a shield equal to 120% of Attack for 6 seconds and grants [Fervor] to 1 other random ally Luminary.
Whenever obtaining [Fervor], grants [Fervor] to 2 other random ally Luminaries.
Increases own Physical Defense by 15% and Attack by 5%.
When under [Grace] Status, [Sword of the Covenant] cannot be dodged or blocked.
[Sword of the Covenant] When hitting a target with Overdrive Energy Consumption of no less than 7, applies 10 seconds of [Silence].

skills.name: Sword of the Covenant
skills.description:
Unleashes a heaving greatsword strike, dealing physical damage equal to 440% of Attack to enemies within a rectangular area.
This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] is triggered, damage increases by 35%, and if the target's Overdrive Energy cost is greater than 4, damage is increased by a further 35% for each additional point of Energy cost (up to a maximum increase of 140%).
When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, the attack range of this skill increases, and base damage increases to 560% of Attack.

skills.name: Bladestorm
skills.description:
Launches a flurry of attacks, dealing physical damage equal to 140% of Attack to enemies within a rectangular area. Each attack has a 9% chance to grant [Fervor].
When in the [Grace] status, this skill's attack range and number of attack instances increase.

skills.name: Excalibur's Awakening
skills.description: When gaining [Grace], unleashes Excalibur, dealing physical damage equal to 210% of Attack to enemies within a massive circular area, and increasing the Energy cost of the next Overdrives unleashed by enemy Luminaries hit by 2.

skills.name: Eternal King
skills.description:
Increases Damage Reduction by 18%.
When in the [Grace] status, instead increases Damage Amplification by 18% and Life Steal by 18%.

skills.name: The Oath of the Warrior
skills.description: [Sword of the Covenant] Ignores 20% of the target's current defense (this defense-ignoring effect can stack up to 40%).

name: Asmodeus
title: The Demon Lord of Lust
lore: Asmodeus is one of the oldest demon lords of Hell, the embodiment of desire among the Seven Deadly Sins. Throughout countless ages, she has silently observed the rise and fall of various worlds. Unlike the cruelty of other demon lords, she is more fond of weaving dreamsâ€”sowing delusions in the emperor's night and planting ambition in the beggar's dreams. All beings are actors on her stage, and she only needs to gently pluck the strings of desire to make the entire world dance.

talent_levels.effect: When present, allied elite summons gain 6 seconds of [Hellfire] upon entering the field. Units carrying [Hellfire] gain 50% increased attack. [Hellfire] deals magic damage equal to 210% of the Demon Lord's attack per second to enemy units in a medium circular area around it (the damage source is considered the Demon Lord). This damage increases by 10% for each stack of [Deathrattle] the summoner has. Whenever an allied unit is defeated, gain 1 stack of [Deathrattle].
The duration of [Hellfire] is increased to 9 seconds.
Increases own defense by 10% and healing received by 4%.
For each allied elite summon on the field, increase own damage reduction by 20% (up to 120%).

While present, the [Little Devil]'s [Angry Thrust] additionally applies [Demon Spikes] for 8 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. When [Hellfire] or summoned units attack enemy units with [Demon Spikes], the damage is increased by an additional 40% * the number of [Demon Spikes] stacks.

skills.name: Demon Reinforcements
skills.description: The user knocks away the imp doll they are carrying, dealing magic damage equal to 740% of their attack to enemy units within a medium-sized circular area at the target location and inflicting a [Attack Speed Down] debuff. They then summon 3 [Little Devil] units at the target location (maximum 3 per instance). Each [Little Devil] unit inherits 75% of the user's attack, 50% of their health, and 100% of their other attributes, lasting for 15 seconds. At the end of the skill, all allied elite summons gain 6 seconds of [Hellfire]. [Little Devil] will perform a basic attack on the nearest enemy unit, each basic attack dealing 60% of [Little Devil]'s attack as magic damage. He also has the skill [Angry Thrust]: Pierces through a single target, dealing 360% of [Little Devil]'s attack as magic damage (considered as basic attack damage), with a base cooldown of 6 seconds.

skills.name: Hell Dance
skills.description: She leaps and spins, dealing 6 hits to a single target, totaling 590% of her attack as magic damage. Each hit has a 30% chance to inflict a 0.2-second stun and restore 10% of her maximum health. If she is already at full health, she will instead heal the ally with the lowest current health, either a Luminary or a Wyrm. The chance increases by 2% for each stack of [Deathrattle].

skills.name: Blood Thirst
skills.description: When Hellfire or a summoned creature deals damage to an enemy unit with a basic attack, the Demon Lord recovers health equal to 33% of the damage dealt.When its own health decreases, it will accumulate rage. When the rage is full, it enters the [Wild] state. While in the [Wild] state, it will additionally restore health to all allied Luminaries equal to 22% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Demon King's Decree
skills.description: Consumes 40% of its current HP to grant itself and all allied elite summons a shield equal to 37% of their maximum HP, along with [Attack Speed Boost] and [Attack Boost]. The shield lasts for 6 seconds.

skills.name: A Farewell Gift
skills.description: [Demon Reinforcements] When the Demon Lord is present, when [Little Devil] dies, it deals an additional 400% of the Demon Lord's attack as magic damage to enemy units within a large circular area and inflicts [Magic Defense Down].

name: Azure Dragon
title: Four Saints
lore: The girl in armor had dragon horns on her forehead, a testament to her identityâ€”the Azure Dragon God, guardian of the East. The Azure Dragon God commands the Seven Mansions of the East, and her absolute power places her at the head of the Four Saints.
quote: Clouds Gather, Rain Falls, All Are Blessed.

talent_levels.effect: When affected by a Shield, increases Bonus Damage by 26%. When not affected by a Shield, increases Damage Reduction by 26%. Whenever an allied unit is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. Each stack increases this Talent's bonus effect by 8%.
When releasing Overdrive, additionally grants a Shield equal to 25% of Max HP. Lasts 6s.
Increases HP by 10% and Shield Effect by 4%.
The Shield value provided by the first [Azure Dragon Formation] is doubled.
Shields provided by skills grant the bearer 2 stacks of [Deathrattle] when the duration ends, even if not broken. If broken, additionally grants 2 stacks of [Deathrattle] and [Physical Defense Up].

skills.name: Draconic Dominion
skills.description: Rides a dragon toward the designated location, dealing up to 400% of Attack as Physical Damage to each enemy along the path. If the current target lies on the path, it is knocked back to the designated location. Upon arrival, deals Physical Damage equal to 410% of Attack plus 100% of current Shield value to enemies within a large circular area and knocks them into the air.

skills.name: Crescent Skybreak
skills.description: Deals Physical Damage equal to 280% of the caster's Attack to a single target and grants a Shield equal to 20% of Max HP for 6s. Each time an ally uses an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. When casting this skill, consuming 3 stacks of [Awakening] enhances the skill: unleashes an additional blade swing, dealing Physical Damage equal to 420% of the caster's Attack plus 100% of current Shield value to enemies in a straight line and applies [Physical Defense Down].

skills.name: Dragonscale Armor
skills.description: In battle, increases own Max HP by 18%. When a Shield provided by this unit's skills is broken, grants 2 stacks of [Deathrattle] to the Shield's bearer.

skills.name: Azure Dragon Formation
skills.description: Grants all allied units a Shield equal to 20% of Max HP for 10s. Whenever any of these Shields is broken, reduces this skill's cooldown by 1s. Triggers once immediately at the start of battle.

skills.name: Azure Dragon's Protection
skills.description: [Azure Dragon Formation] Reduces cooldown by 1 second when the shield applied by the user is broken.

name: Brynhild
title: Warborn Goddess
lore: Odin's attendant, a sacred and noble Valkyrie, belonging to Valhalla, the Temple of Heroes. Even among the Valkyries, she is the most powerful and compassionate, often riding a white horse across the skies, overlooking the earth, her gleaming shield reflecting the aurora borealis, giving warriors courage and faith.

talent_levels.effect: When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. Each time it enters the [Grace] status, grants itself a Shield equal to 220% of its Attack for 6s. Each time it exits the [Grace] status, grants itself 1 stack of [Radiant Ember]. Each stack of [Radiant Ember] increases its Attack by 11%.
When the number of allied units on the field is greater than the enemy's, Attack is increased by 25%.
Increases HP by 10% and Crit by 50.
[Radiance Battlefield] Grants [Morale] to allies within an extra-large circular area around self.
[Radiant Ash Ring] During its duration, each time an allied Luminary gains a [Blessing Buff], the duration of [Radiant Ash Ring] is extended by 1s (up to a maximum of 5s).

skills.name: Radiant Ash Ring
Radiance Battlefield
skills.description: Deals physical damage equal to 160% of Attack to enemy units in a large circular area, and grants [Morale].

skills.name: Warborn Goddess' Helm
skills.description:
During battle, increases Physical and Magic Defense by 10%.
Gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle] whenever an ally is defeated.
Each stack further increases defenses by 1%.

skills.name: Whirling Slash
skills.description: Spins forward, dealing physical damage equal to 120% of Attack to enemies in a straight line and gaining [Fervor].

skills.name: Enhanced Offense
skills.description: [Radiant Ash Ring] Increases own ultimate skill damage by 8% per second during its duration, stacking up to 10 times, and clears when the skill ends.

name: Marylis
title: Six-Armed Serpent
lore: A demigod basilisk with six arms, born in the distant past, is arrogant and dangerous. She revels in bloodshed and slaughter, devoid of any human morality. She once reaped great victories in battles between evil creatures and gods, but was ultimately banished to the underground kingdom as punishment, condemned only to bite the wicked and the dying. Over countless ages, she has built a magnificent palace underground, amassing countless bizarre and wondrous treasures...

talent_levels.effect: Deals additional physical damage equal to 24% of Attack whenever dealing physical damage.
While in the [Wild] status, Overdrive Energy Cost -1.
Increases Attack by 5% and Haste by 5.
While in the [Wild] status, Damage Reduction increases by 30%.
Each time [Blade Dance] is cast, reduces [Limit Breaker] Cooldown by 3 seconds.

skills.name: Limit Breaker
skills.description: Sacrifices 40% of current HP to deal physical damage equal to 180% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area and restores HP 6 times. Each amount restored is equal to 20% of lost HP.

skills.name: Blade Dance
skills.description: Sacrifices 10% of current HP to deal physical damage equal to 440% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area.

skills.name: Absolute Focus
skills.description:
In battle, increases Attack by 10%.
Each time an ally unleashes an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. When possessing [Awakening], immediately consumes 1 stack of [Awakening] to launch 1 additional [Blade Dance].

skills.name: Sacrifice
skills.description: Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, Life Steal increases by 36% and [Blade Dance] damage increases by 50%.

skills.name: Abyss Fantasy
skills.description: [Absolute Focus] Has a 30% chance of not consuming [Awakening].

name: Siegfried
title: Dragonslayer
lore: The only princess of Midham, the "Kingdom Below the Mountain", inherits the bloodline of the first hero, Sigurd. She has a straightforward and carefree personality. Having grown up listening to the legends of Sigurd, she also dreams of becoming a hero and protecting the people of Midham.
quote: Between you and me, it's irreconcilable!

talent_levels.effect:
In battle, increases HP by 14%.
Attack increases by 29% when attacking enemies afflicted with an [Elemental Debuff].
When entering the [Wild] status, grants allies within a medium circular area [Attack Boost].
Increases HP by 10% and Attack by 5%.
After triggering [Elemental Reactions], restores 30% of lost HP.
Life Steal increases by 30% when attacking enemies afflicted with an [Elemental Debuff].

skills.name: Infernal Wyrm
skills.description: Slashes out multiple rings of fire, dealing physical damage equal to 240% of Attack to enemies along 3 paths and dealing physical damage equal to 270% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area at the ring's destination. The ring of fire inflicts [Ignite] on enemies it collides with.

skills.name: Flamecleave
skills.description: Sacrifices 15% of current HP to unleash 3 pillars of fire, dealing physical damage equal to 140% of Attack to enemies within a rectangular area and inflicting [Physical Defense Down].

skills.name: Fearless Hero
skills.description: Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, Attack, Physical Defense, and Magic Defense increase by 30%.

skills.name: Flamecoil
skills.description:
Flings a ring of fire forward, dealing physical damage equal to a maximum of 240% of Attack to enemies within a large rectangular area.
While in the [Wild] status, additionally grants a shield equal to 180% of Attack. Lasts 8 seconds.

skills.name: King's Sensation
skills.description: [Flamecleave] Can be automatically cast on enemies, and it comes with [Physical Defense Down], which triggers once every 15 seconds.

name: Tyrfing
title: Bloodthirster Sword
lore: Tyrfong, the sword of cleavage, once drawn, will surely strike its target, draw blood, and kill its master.
quote: So much death, so much power.

talent_levels.effect:
In battle, increases Attack by 15%.
When basic attacks deal damage, steals 7% of the current target's Healing Received effects. Lasts 10 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.
Each time an ally triggers the [Punishment] effect, the energy cost of the Overdrive [Rage Reborn] is reduced by 1.
Increases own dual defenses by 5% and Life Steal by 5%.
When releasing [Rage Reborn], restores Rage to 100%. While in the [Wild] status, Attack increases by 20%.
Each time an ally triggers the [Punishment] effect, increases own next Overdrive Damage by 15%, up to a maximum of 90%.

skills.name: Rage Reborn
skills.description:
Transforms into [Bloodferno Form], dealing physical damage equal to 300% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area around self upon transforming, and recovering 20% of Max HP. Gains immunity to control effects while this skill is active.
When in [Bloodferno Form], Attack and Life Steal increase by 20%, basic attacks deal AoE damage, and Overdrive is replaced with [Crimson Execution]: Costs 3 Overdrive Energy. Unleashes a series of deadly hacks and slashes on enemies in the area ahead, dealing physical damage equal to 760% of Attack.

skills.name: Soulburning Blade
skills.description:
Sacrifices 20% of current HP to deal physical damage equal to 240% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area, and grants [Attack Speed Boost].
This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect, increasing damage by 20% when triggered. While in [Bloodferno Form], base damage is increased to 360% of Attack and also grants [Attack Boost].

skills.name: Taste of Blood
skills.description: Increases Life Steal by 12%. When HP falls below 50%, this effect is doubled.

skills.name: Wildshade Phantom
skills.description: Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, each basic attack and [Crimson Execution] hit has a 70% chance to deal additional physical damage equal to 100% of Attack.

skills.name: Phantom Strike
skills.description: The trigger probability of [Wildshade Phantom] has been increased from 70% to 100%.

name: Asteros
title: Labyrinth Overlord
lore: The Minotaur was born by chance under the curse of Poseidon, the god of the sea. In order to keep the existence of this bull-headed, man-bodied monster a secret, Minos asked Daedalus to build an extremely complex labyrinth as a prison to imprison the Minotaur.

talent_levels.effect: Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, begins spinning relentlessly to strike nearby enemies. Each spin deals physical damage equal to 100% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], [Savage Cyclone] damage is increased by an additional 2%.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
While in the [Wild] status, Healing Increases by 30%.
While in the [Wild] status, Attack increases by 5% per second (up to 100%). Resets upon exiting the [Wild] status.

skills.name: Heaven's Mandate
skills.description: Sacrifices 20% of current HP to materialize a spirit avatar that deals physical damage equal to 420% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area and launches them into the air. The avatar also deals physical damage equal to 140% of Attack to enemies along its path.

skills.name: Savage Charge
skills.description: Becomes supercharged when charging for the first time, dealing additional physical damage equal to 160% of Attack and launching the target into the air.

skills.name: Ancestral Will
skills.description: Whenever entering the [Wild] status, instantly recovers 22% of lost HP.

skills.name: Battleborn
skills.description: While in the [Wild] status, Attack increases by 25% and gains immunity to control effects.

skills.name: Wild Cyclone
skills.description: [Savage Cyclone] The range of the circle has changed from medium to large.

name: Beowulf
title: King of the Wild Hunt
lore: A powerful warrior clad in jet-black armor, his body shimmering with ghostly flames. His physical form had long since decayed, but his warlike spirit refused to rest.
quote: I have shed my mortal form.

talent_levels.effect:
When taking fatal damage for the first time, defies death, instantly recovering 60% of Max HP. In the following battle, Attack Speed increases by 60%, and loses 10% of Max HP per second.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], the speed at which HP is lost decreases by 3%.
[Hammer Time] Damage increased by 30%.
Increases HP by 15%.
Each use of [Hammer Time], reduces the Energy cost of this unit's next Overdrive by 1.
At 5 stacks of [Deathrattle], Hammer Time becomes AoE Damage.

skills.name: Dark Rising
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 330% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area. For the next 8 seconds, deals magic damage equal to 110% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area every 2 seconds.

skills.name: Hammer Time
skills.description: Delivers a hammer blow to a single enemy, dealing magic damage equal to 320% of Attack. After dealing damage, steals 7% of the target's magic defense (does not affect bosses) for 8 seconds. This steal effect can stack up to 5 times.

skills.name: Unbreakable Form
skills.description:
When dealing damage with skills, grants a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for each enemy hit. Lasts 6 seconds.
For each stack of [Deathrattle], the shield effect increases by 2%.

skills.name: Infinite Strength
skills.description:
In battle, increases Attack by 10%.
Each time an ally unleashes an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. When possessing [Awakening], immediately consumes 1 stack of [Awakening] to launch 1 additional [Hammer Time].

name: Guna
title: Heroic Warrior
lore: Guna was the kingdom's most loyal and courageous warrior, sacrificing herself to cover the retreat of her people during an enemy invasion. Selfless and fearless, that's how those around her always described her. After her sacrifice, Guna was guided to the heavens and reborn as a candidate Valkyrie.
quote: I was chosen by Odin himself!

talent_levels.effect: Each time you gain [Blessing Buff], your next Basic Attack is buffed and deals physical damage equal to 210% of your Attack to all enemies within a large circular area and recovers HP equal to 210% of your Attack.
[Blade Shadow Blitz] additionally inflicts [Stun] for 1s when [Punishment] is triggered.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
[Iron Bulwark Shock] Grants [Morale] to allied Luminaries in a large circular area.
Whenever the current target gains a shield, immediately reset the cooldown of [Blade Shadow Blitz].

skills.name: Radiant Sword Formation
skills.description: Select a single target and cast a beam of light, dealing physical damage equal to 320% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area around the target, and deals double damage to the selected target. When both [Morale] and [Fervor] are active, enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, additionally inflicts [Stun] for 4s on the selected target.

skills.name: Iron Bulwark Shock
skills.description:
Raises shield and enters a charging stance, granting [Morale].
After 3s, deals physical damage equal to 180% of own Attack to enemy units in a large circular area.
When charging, each time damage is taken, this skill's damage is increased by 15% (up to a maximum of 150%).

skills.name: Shield-Shattering Blade
skills.description:
Increases damage dealt by 45% when attacking enemies with a shield.
After damaging a shielded enemy, restores HP equal to 40% of Attack.

skills.name: Blade Shadow Blitz
skills.description:
Moves behind a target and deals physical damage equal to 340% of Attack.
This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] is triggered, Crit increases by 1500 for this skill.

name: Grimnir
title: Death Seeker
quote: I will fight to the death!

talent_levels.effect: When continuously attacking the same target, Attack Speed increases by 19% after each instance of damage dealt. Stacks up to 10 times. Resets when changing targets.
While in the [Wild] status, Overdrive Skill cost is reduced by 1.
Increases Attack by 12%.
While in the [Wild] status, gains immunity to control effects and increases Damage Reduction by an additional 15%.

skills.name: Glory Days
skills.description: Leaps into the air and launches a colossal strike, dealing physical damage equal to 270% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area around the target. For the next 8 seconds, basic attacks deal additional physical damage equal to 80% of Attack.

skills.name: Valor's Cry
skills.description: With a primal roar, ignites the martial spirit, sacrificing 40% of current HP to gain [Attack Up] and a shield equal to 42% of lost HP for 6 seconds.

skills.name: No Guts, No Glory
skills.description: Gains Rage when HP decreases. When Rage is at the limit, enters the [Wild] status. While in the [Wild] status, Attack Speed increases by 35% and Damage Reduction increases by 15%.

talent_levels.effect: When launching basic attacks on targets with an Overdrive Energy cost of 4 or more, deals additional magic damage equal to 60% of Attack and restores HP equal to 36% of Attack.
Each time an ally unleashes an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. Each stack of [Awakening] increases self Magic Defense by 4%.
Boosts Magic Defense by 18%.
When possessing at least 4 stacks of [Awakening], [Duskfall] changes to increase the target's next Overdrive Energy Cost by 2.

skills.name: Duskfall
skills.description: Unleashes the Firelord, dealing magic damage equal to 290% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area, while increasing the Energy cost of their next Overdrive by 1.

skills.name: Furious Thrust
skills.description: Pierces through a single target, dealing magic damage equal to 280% of Attack.

skills.name: Demon Spike
skills.description: In battle, increases Attack by 8%. For each enemy Luminary on the battlefield with an Overdrive Energy cost of 4 or more, Attack increases by an additional 3%.

talent_levels.effect: Upon death, summons 2 Goblin Clubbers that inherit 30% of Attack, 40% of HP, and 100% of all other stats.
Summoned Goblin Clubber gains [Adrenaline].
Increases Attack by 10%.

skills.name: Siegebreaker
skills.description: Deals physical damage to a single target equal to 520% of Attack and launches them into the air. Deals additional damage based on current HP percentage, with higher HP resulting in higher damage. Dies after attacking.

skills.name: Colossal Whirlstrike
skills.description: The Goblin in front raises its battering ram and swings it in two circles, dealing physical damage equal to 250% of Attack to enemies within a large circular area.

talent_levels.effect: In battle, increases Attack by 15%.

skills.name: Martyr's Might
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 620% of Attack to enemies within a medium circular area, then dies.

name: Apollo
title: Sun Goddess
lore: Apollo, the son of light, is the embodiment of music and prophecy. He is also the god of medicine and animal husbandry. Upholding justice and virtue, he guides humanity forward.
quote: My radiance isn't something you can handle.

talent_levels.effect: After dealing damage with Basic Attack, applies [Sigil of Radiance]. When dealing damage with skills, for each stack of [Sigil of Radiance] on the target, deals additional Physical Damage equal to 2% of the target's Max HP per instance of damage (up to 30% of your Attack).
At the start of battle, grants [Fervor] to all allied back-row Luminaries.
Each time the Overdrive lands a Crit, it grants a Shield equal to 12% of its Attack for 10s, stacking up to 20 stacks.
For every 10 applications of [Sigil of Radiance], permanently increases Critical Damage by 8% for the rest of the battle. Stacks up to 10 times.
Increases Attack by 8% and Crit by 120.
Increases Crit by 200.

skills.name: Solar Arrow Stream
skills.description: Transforms into the sun, firing 30 arrows to sweep through enemies ahead, each arrow dealing physical damage equal to 74% of Attack. During the skill's duration, Damage Reduction increases by 30%. Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For every 5 stacks of [Deathrattle], fires an additional 10 arrows.

skills.name: Lightfall Arrow Rain
skills.description:
Calls down a rain of blades, striking enemies in an extra-large circular area around the target 5 times, each hit dealing 34% of Attack as physical damage.
At the end, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle] and [Attack Speed Boost].

skills.name: Will of the Sun
skills.description:
When a Basic Attack crits a target marked with [Sigil of Radiance], there's a 17% chance to gain [Fervor].
If the target has max stacks of [Sigil of Radiance], also grants [Fervor] to the 2 nearest ally Luminaries.

skills.name: Scatterlight Arrow
skills.description: When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, Basic Attack additionally deals splash damage equal to 95% of Attack (splash damage is also considered Basic Attack damage but cannot Crit).

skills.name: Blazing Arrow River
skills.description: [Solar Arrow Stream] Increases damage by 40% against targets with less than 50% health.

name: Artemis
title: The Moon Goddess
lore:
She was the moon goddess and goddess of the hunt in Olympus, the daughter of Zeus and the Titan Leto, and the twin sister of Apollo.
When Artemis was three years old, she asked her father for eternal purity, twenty nymphs as her handmaidens, and the power to rule over the mountains, forests, and cities. Zeus gladly granted her request and also bestowed upon her the position of guardian goddess of the continents and islands, allowing her silver light to shine upon the rivers, seas, and lands.

talent_levels.effect:
For each layer of [Moon Soul] a character possesses, their attack power increases by 6%. When your [Moon Soul] reaches 5 stacks, consume all [Moon Soul] to enter the [Full Moon] state. While in the [Full Moon] state, increase your attack by 60% and attack speed by 200%, reduce ultimate skill energy cost by 2, and reduce the cooldown of [Luna Arrow] by 1 second with each normal attack.
Each time our side releases an ultimate skill, we gain 1 stack of [Awakening].
When casting [Luna Arrow], you gain an additional 1 stack of [Moon Soul].

After the battle begins, all of our ranged Luminaries (up to 4, prioritizing Luminaries with higher attack) enter the [Dark Moon] state for 8 seconds (if there are no other selectable allied Luminaries or dragons on the field, the Dark Moon state provided by this skill is changed to 4 seconds).
The duration of all effects applied by [Embrace of the Dark Moon] is increased by 50%, and upon casting, the caster gains 5 stacks of [Moon Soul].
Increases own attack by 10% and attack speed by 8%.
Increases own attack speed by 16%.

skills.name: Embrace of the Dark Moon
skills.description:
Increases the skill haste of all allied ranged Luminaries by 25 and their damage by 25% for 6 seconds, and puts the caster and one allied Luminary or dragon with the lowest health into the [Dark Moon] state for 4 seconds.
Upon activation, the user gains 3 stacks of [Moon Soul]. (If there are no other selectable allied Luminaries or dragons on the field, the [Dark Moon] status granted by this skill is changed to 2 seconds).

skills.name: Luna Arrow
skills.description:
Fires an arrow that deals physical damage equal to 420% of the caster's attack to a single target.
If [Awakening] is available, consume 1 stack of [Awakening] to enhance this skill: fire an additional arrow, and the damage of each arrow is increased to 630% of your own attack. When released, grant yourself 1 stack of [Moon Soul].

skills.name: Shadowy Hunt
skills.description:
Each time the user enters or exits the [Dark Moon] state, they immediately fire one arrow at each of the enemy Luminaries, dealing physical damage equal to 210% of their attack. There is a 50% chance to inflict [Physical Defense Down] and [Next Ultimate Skill Energy Cost +1] on each target. Targets with an ultimate skill energy cost below 4 will always be inflicted with the [Next Ultimate Skill Energy Cost +1] effect.
Each time our side triggers the [Punishment] effect, the damage of this skill increases by 8% (up to a maximum of 240%).

skills.name: Owl Leap
skills.description: When about to receive critical damage, the user becomes immune to damage for 0.5 seconds and enters the [Dark Moon] state for 2 seconds. During this state, the user leaps to one side and fires an additional arrow dealing physical damage equal to 630% of their attack to the source of the damage. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect, which inflicts a 5-second [Silence] effect. (This skill can trigger a maximum of once every 5 seconds.)

skills.name: Dark Moon Rage
skills.description: Whenever the user enters the [Dark Moon] state, all allied ranged Luminaries gain [Crit Up], and the user also gains [Crit Damage Up].

name: Huginn & Muninn
title: Twin Ravens
lore: A strange girl is always accompanied by a talking crow. She rarely speaks, but the crow that follows her chatteres incessantly, expressing her opinions and needs. She possesses extraordinary wisdom and enjoys observing changes in things from the shadows.
quote: No one can escape my eyes.

talent_levels.effect: After hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack or skill 7 times, applies [Scar Sigil] to the target. Increases 650 Critical Hit when attacking a target with [Scar Sigil].

When basic attacks deal damage to enemy units with an Overdrive Energy Cost of 4 or more, ignores 15% of their Physical Defense. If the target carries a [Scar Sigil], the effect is doubled. (Defense Ignore effect can stack up to 40%)
Increases Attack by 5% and Attack Speed by 6%.
Consumes 50% of its current HP when casting [Featherstorm]. If the skill is not interrupted during casting, it gains a Shield equal to 50% of its max HP for 8s.
When casting [Featherstorm], becomes briefly untargetable and gains [Attack Speed Boost] when the effect ends.

skills.name: Featherstorm
skills.description: Shoots feathers forward, which briefly stay and then return. Deals Physical Damage equal to 185% of own Attack to enemy units in a large fan-shaped area upon shooting and returning.

skills.name: Bedlam Beacon
skills.description: Calls upon Muninn to deal 210% of Attack as Physical Damage to a Single Target. If the target has [Scar Sigil], additionally applies [Physical Defense Down].

skills.name: Ricochet
skills.description:
Each Basic Attack consumes 5% of current HP and ricochets between enemy units, dealing 50% Damage per bounce for up to 2 bounces.
Rage accumulates as HP decreases. At max rage, enters [Wild] Status. During [Wild] Status, gains 25% Life Steal and Attack Speed, plus 2 additional ricochets.

skills.name: Raven Raid
skills.description: Summons a flock of crows to Attack enemies in a straight line. The crows deal 90% of their Attack as Physical Damage to surrounding enemies every 0.2 seconds.

skills.name: Preemptive Strike
skills.description: [Ricochet] Increases damage by 25% against targets with more than 60% health.

name: Ifrit
title: Flamefiend
lore: Born from the element of fire, this demon possesses the power to manipulate all flames. By nature cruel, cunning, arrogant, and eager to create chaos, she is the vanguard of the Wild Hunt, following the orders of the Black Knight. Currently, she is sowing discord and causing disasters across various regions, finding not only pleasure in the chaos and turmoil she creates, but also thoroughly enjoying it.

talent_levels.effect: After inflicting Physical Damage three times on the same target, triggers an extra hit of Physical Damage equal to 86% of this unit's Attack.
After triggering an [Elemental Reaction], reduces the Energy cost of your next Overdrive by 1.
Increases Attack by 10% and Crit by 50.
When triggering [Flamebrand], has a 50% chance to apply [Physical Defense Down] to the target.
When triggering [Flamebrand], reduces the [Hexagram] Cooldown by 1 second.

skills.name: Hexagram
skills.description: Fires 16 fireballs to bombard all enemy units, each fireball dealing 255% of the caster's Attack as Physical Damage. The same unit takes only 20% Damage when hit by the second or subsequent fireballs.

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description:
Unleash a fiery vortex dealing 4 hits of Physical Damage to enemies in a medium circular area.
Each hit deals 38% of Attack as Physical Damage and inflicts [Ignite]. Each Overdrive cast grants 1 stack of [Awakening]. At 3/6 stacks of [Awakening], hits increase to 6/8.

skills.name: Frenzy
skills.description: In combat, boosts your Attack by 10%. Each stack of [Awakening] adds +4% Attack

skills.name: Endless Flames
skills.description: Launch a fire shell dealing Physical Damage equal to 180% of Attack in a small circular area. Each stack of [Awakening] launches an additional fire shell (up to 4), with extra shells dealing 25% Damage.

skills.name: Domain of Fire
skills.description: [Flamebrand] At the start of battle, apply 1 stack of [Flamebrand] to all enemy units.

name: Jing
title: Crimson Blade Soul
lore: Jing is an assassin. From the time she can remember, she has been learning assassination techniques from her master, honing her skills day after day. Finally, on the day she came of age, her master gave her five short blades, telling her that her mission was to be the ruler of the world, to assassinate unjust gods, and to protect the rights of mortals.

talent_levels.effect: At the start of battle, reduce your critical hit rate by half. The reduced critical hit rate will be converted into critical hit damage proportionally, with every 10 points of critical hit rate converted into 1% critical hit damage. When a basic attack or the Phantom Sword from [Unlimited Blade Works] deals a critical hit, it will additionally deal physical damage equal to 330%/360%/390%/420%/450%/480%/510% of its own attack to the target, and this damage will also have an additional 1500 critical hit chance (this can only be triggered once per second on the same target).
Each time the user enters the [Wild] state, all allied Luminaries in the [Wild] state gain [Crit Up].
Increases own attack by 5% and critical hit rate by 100%.
Enemy units within the sword array of [Unlimited Blade Works] cannot gain any buffs or shields.

[Sword Shadow Chasing Soul] skill adds damage that ignores 30% of the target's physical defense (the defense-ignoring effect can stack up to 40%), and the trigger interval on the same target is reduced to 0.2 seconds.

skills.name: Unlimited Blade Works
skills.description: Deals 450%/490%/530%/570%/610%/650% physical damage to a single target , then creates a sword array around the target for 7 seconds. Enemy units within the sword array have their movement speed reduced by 90%, while allied elite summons within the sword array have their critical strike damage increased by 90%. While the sword formation exists, after each basic attack or active skill cast by the user or an elite summoned unit within the sword formation, a phantom sword is cast on a random enemy unit within the sword formation, dealing physical damage equal to 164%/180%/196%/212%/228%/244% of the user's attack (prioritizing targets not attacked by the phantom sword).

skills.name: Crimson Lotus Blade
skills.description: Unleashes 5 spinning blades against a single target, dealing a total of 480%/520%/560%/600%/640%/680% of the user's attack as physical damage. Each blade that crits grants 1 stack of [Deathrattle].

skills.name: Dance of the Sword
skills.description: When your own health decreases, you will accumulate rage. When your rage is full, you will enter the [Wild] state. In the [Wild] state, your basic attack will become a continuous firing of 5 blades, dealing physical damage equal to 75%/81%/87%/93%/99%/105% of your own attack.

skills.name: Echo of the Sword Soul
skills.description: During battle, increases own attack by 10%/11%/12%/13%/14%. Whenever an allied unit is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], increases own attack by an additional 1.5%. Each time [Deathrattle] is gained, gains an additional 15% rage.

skills.name: Sword Shadow Hunter
skills.description: [Sword Shadow Chasing Soul] Every 10 points of critical hits are converted into 1.5% critical hit damage.

name: Mimir
title: The Wise Giant
lore: Mimir is a wise giant who understands the essence of all things, the master of the wellspring of wisdom. She is not a guardian of knowledge, but rather the very form in which knowledge flows. At first, she was captivated by exploring the metaphysical laws of the world. She rejoiced in new life and wept for destruction. However, as the boundaries of knowledge reached their limit, the warp and weft of destiny wove together in her eyes into an unalterable map. She foresaw the fall of every drop of dew, the trajectory of every life, and even the end of the godsâ€”all things rise and fall on their predetermined paths, without exception.

talent_levels.effect: The user's basic attack will release a wheel to attack the target, with each basic attack dealing 4 hits of physical damage equal to 40% of the user's attack. Every 8 hits of basic attack grant the user 1 stack of [Shield of Wisdom], which can stack up to 20 times. Each stack of [Shield of Wisdom] provides the user with a shield equal to 9% of their attack and increases their critical hit damage by 6% for 8 seconds.
For every 5 stacks of [Shield of Wisdom] gained, gain an additional random blessing-type buff (prioritizing those you do not currently possess).
Increases own attack by 10% and shield effect by 4%.

When [Shield of Wisdom] is active, the user gains 1500 Crit Resistance, and when the user gains a [Blessing Buff] status, one random friendly Sanctuary Luminary also gains the same [Blessing Buff] status.
[Cyclone Slash] grants an additional 1 stack of [Shield of Wisdom]. Each time [Time Flying Wheel] deals damage, it reduces the cooldown of [Cyclone Slash] by 0.3 seconds.

skills.name: Cyclone Slash
skills.description: Grants the user 2 stacks of [Shield of Wisdom], dealing 20 instances of physical damage equal to 27.5% of the user's attack to a single target. At the end of the skill, deals physical damage equal to 220% of the user's attack to enemy units within a large circular area around the target. Each hit of this skill deals additional physical damage equal to 44% of the user's current shield value.

skills.name: Time Flying Wheel
skills.description: Launches a wheel at the furthest enemy Luminary, which travels in a straight line and returns. On both the forward and return journeys, the wheel deals physical damage equal to 162% of the caster's attack to any enemy units it collides with. When you possess both Morale and Fighting Spirit, you enter the Grace state. While in the Grace state, this skill fires an enhanced version of a roulette wheel, with each hit dealing additional physical damage equal to 108% of your current shield value. The Grace state ends when the skill ends.

skills.name: Arcane Torrent
skills.description: Increases own attack speed by 25%. During battle, increases own critical hit rate by 250. Each time our side releases an ultimate skill, we gain 1 stack of [Awakening]. When we have [Awakening], we immediately consume 1 stack of [Awakening] to release [Time Flying Wheel] once more.

skills.name: Double-Edged Wheel
skills.description: For 8 seconds after gaining the [Blessing Buff] status, the user's basic attack is enhanced, increasing the number of damage hits to 8, and each hit deals 55% of the user's attack damage.

skills.name: Turning Defense into Offense
skills.description: The shield damage from [Time Flying Wheel] and [Cyclone Slash] is increased by 30%.

name: Ningluosi
title: Rotten Flower Bud
lore: She was a new shoot that grew from the World Tree Yggdrasil beside the spring of Hvaghmir, and was named Nimros by the gods, meaning "white flower". That day, the black dragon Nidhogg gnawed through the main root, and its poisonous saliva surged up her buds year after year. The source poison and tree sap coexisted in her blood vessels, and she heard countless parallel universes of herself begin to pulsate at the same moment.

talent_levels.effect: The damage dealt by the user's basic attacks and skills ignores enemy shields. While the user is present, all allied units gain increased damage of 32%/34.5%/37%/39.5%/42%/44.5%/47% when attacking enemy units with shields. The user's basic attack prioritizes targets in the [Withering Thorns] state, and the attack range is doubled when attacking targets in the [Withering Thorns] state.
Increases damage dealt by an additional 35% when attacking enemy units with shields.
Increases own attack by 10% and attack speed by 4%.
The additional damage dealt when triggering [Punishment] for [Corruption and Decay] is doubled.
[Corruption and Decay] removes all buffs and the [Reduced Energy Cost of Next Ultimate] effect from the primary target before dealing damage.

skills.name: Corruption and Decay
skills.description: Deals physical damage equal to 720%/795%/870%/945%/1020%/1095% of the user's attack to a single target and applies the [Withering Thorns] debuff. Then, deals additional physical damage equal to 240% of the user's attack to enemy units within a large circular area around the target. Grants 1 stack of [Deathrattle] when the vines disappear. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When the [Punishment] effect is triggered, the first hit of damage will deal physical damage equal to 80%/85%/90%/95%/100%/105% of the target's current ultimate energy consumption.

skills.name: Death Whip
skills.description: Deals 4 instances of physical damage equal to 195%/210%/225%/240%/255%/270% of the user's attack to a single target. Briefly immobilizes the target during the damage. If the target is in the [Withering Thorns] state, each instance of damage additionally applies a random [Stat Debuff]. Grants 1 stack of [Deathrattle] when the vines disappear. When there is a target on the field who is in the [Withering Thorns] state, this skill will be used on them first.

skills.name: Flower Spear
skills.description: When your basic attack or active skill deals damage to a target in the [Withering Thorns] state, it will deal additional physical damage equal to 240%/260%/280%/300%/320%/340% of your attack, and there is a 20%/22%/24%/26%/28%/30% chance to increase the target's ultimate skill cooldown by 1 second and extend the duration of [Withering Thorns] by 2 seconds. Whenever an allied unit is defeated, the user gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], the chance is increased by an additional 1.5%.

skills.name: Corruption Throwing Spear
skills.description: Deals physical damage equal to 625%/680%/735%/790%/845% of the user's attack to enemy units in a straight line and increases the energy cost of the next ultimate skill by 1. Each time the [Punishment] effect is triggered by an ally, the cooldown of this skill is reduced by 1 second. When there is a target on the field that is in the [Withering Thorns] state, this skill will be cast towards that target first.

skills.name: Decay and Decay
skills.description: [Corruption and Decay] Increases the additional area damage to 600% of the user's attack.

name: Orion
title: Frostar Hunter
lore: She is a sharp arrow in the frost and snow, piercing the air with a sharp sound; wherever her icy arrows reach, nothing alive remains... Even so, her heart still seeks revenge.

talent_levels.effect: Gain 7% energy when your basic attack hits. Gain an additional 7% energy when the target is under an elemental debuff. Enter the [Concentration] state when full energy, which continuously consumes energy. Exit the [Concentration] state when energy is depleted. While in the [Concentration] state, the basic attack becomes a gust of wind that deals physical damage equal to 195% of the user's attack and applies [Heal Block] once.
[Magic Crystal Arrow] increases the energy cost of the target's next ultimate skill by 1 before dealing damage.
Increases own attack by 10% and attack speed by 3%.
[Magic Crystal Arrow] will always inflict [Chill] after dealing damage, and will immediately grant the caster 50% energy upon casting.
Gain 100% energy at the start of battle.

skills.name: Magic Crystal Arrow
skills.description: Deals physical damage equal to 560% of the user's attack to a single target, then grants the user an [Attack Speed Boost], and allows the user to continuously attack the target for the next 12 seconds, while also significantly increasing the user's attack range. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect, which inflicts an additional 6 seconds of [Stun] when [Punishment] is triggered.

skills.name: A Volley of Arrows
skills.description: Fires two volleys of fan-shaped arrows (considered a basic attack), each arrow dealing 115% of the user's attack as physical damage. If the same target is attacked by multiple arrows in a single volley, the user will only receive 20% damage. While in the [Concentrated] state, fire an additional round of arrows.

skills.name: Frost Arrow
skills.description: After dealing damage, there is a 12% chance to inflict [Chill] (can trigger a maximum of 1 time within 4 seconds on the same target). Attack is increased by 24% when attacking enemy units that are under [Elemental Reaction].

skills.name: Frost Bloodline
skills.description: Increases own attack speed by 26% and accuracy by 390. The effect is halved when the enemy unit gets close.

skills.name: Focus on Combos
skills.description: In the [Concentration] state, each time damage is dealt, an additional 30% of the user's attack is added as physical damage.

name: Lorillin
title: Radiant Elemental
lore: Born from the light, this elemental being spends most of her time concealing her form and rarely appears before humans. She has a carefree personality, and the golden light emanating from her gives off a gentle feeling. However, due to certain reasons, she is forced to work tirelessly for her superiors, and it seems she has accumulated quite a few unspoken complaints and grievancesâ€¦
quote: May this light illuminate your path.

talent_levels.effect: When an enemy unit is inflicted with [Shock], a pillar of light is cast on the target, dealing Physical Damage equal to 135% of own Attack. When both [Morale] and [Fervor] are present, enters the [Grace] Status. While in the [Grace] Status, there is an 8% chance to inflict [Shock] on the target after dealing Damage.
After triggering [Elemental Reaction], gains [Crit Up].
Increases own Attack by 15%.
After triggering [Elemental Reaction], grants [Crit Up] to allies within a large circular area.
When under the [Grace] status, the probability of inflicting [Shock] with Damage dealt is increased to 16%.

skills.name: Flashkick
skills.description: Kicks a single target and applies [Shock], then continuously attacks the target, dealing physical damage equal to 690% of own attack.

skills.name: Photon Bolt
skills.description: Fires multiple light bullets to deal 324% of Attack as Physical Damage to a Single Target.

skills.name: Warp Light
skills.description: Critical Hit is increased by 550 when attacking enemies under [Elemental Debuff] status.

skills.name: Blessing of Brilliance
skills.description: Grants [High Morale] to self and one random ally Luminary (prioritizing Sanctum Glory faction).

skills.name: Radiant Rebirth
skills.description: [Blessing of Brilliance] Additionally grants [Attack Speed Boost].

name: Medusa
title: Gorgon
lore: A terrifying banshee with long hair covered in pythons, sometimes speaking to the pythons on her head. She possesses the ability to petrify, treating petrified human figures as precious toys and collectibles. She spends most of her time lurking in a dark, damp palace, waiting for prey to walk into her trap. For some reason, she harbors a stronger hostility towards men.

talent_levels.effect: After a Basic Attack deals damage, applies 1 stack of [Venom Mark]. At 4 stacks, immediately detonates the mark to deal Physical Damage equal to 190% of the caster's Attack to the target.
Each time [Deathrattle] is gained, applies 1 stack of [Venom Mark] to all enemy units.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
[Snake Venom Mark] After detonation, there is a 10% chance to increase the target's next Overdrive Energy Consumption by 1.
After [Venom Mark] is detonated, it can trigger the [Punishment] effect. After triggering the [Punishment] effect, dispels 1 buff from the target.

skills.name: Stonegaze
skills.description: Deals physical damage equal to 260% of Attack to enemy units in a straight line. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] is triggered, it additionally applies the [Petrify] status for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Broken Arrow
skills.description:
Basic Attacks have a 40% chance to unleash Broken Arrows for 2 additional strikes on random enemies. Broken Arrows deal 65% of base Basic Attack damage.
Each time an ally falls, gain 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. Each stack of [Deathrattle] increases this chance by 2%.

skills.name: Snake Dance
skills.description: For each stack of [Deathrattle], gain Attack Speed Boost 6%

skills.name: Mystic Serpent
skills.description: Releases a Mystic Serpent, which jumps between up to 3 enemy units, dealing 210% Physical Damage based on its own Attack to each target and delaying their Overdrive Cooldown by 3 seconds.

skills.name: Mystic Evil Jade
skills.description: [Mystic Serpent] Can steal an additional 10% attack speed from enemy units for 6 seconds.

name: Van Helsing
title: Demon Hunter
lore: It is said that the Witcher Van Helsing came to the Mirage Mountain in pursuit of a bloodthirsty werewolf. However, even with her superb witch-hunting skills, she needed to explore the geography of the unknown environment before she could accurately track the werewolf's tracks.

talent_levels.effect: Each time a skill is cast, increases Attack Speed by 12%. Stacks 10 times and lasts the entire battle.
Attack increases by 30% when attacking targets with an Overdrive Energy cost of 4 or more.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
When the Attack Speed bonus from [Swift Shot] reaches its maximum stacks, additionally gains +20% Attack and reduces Overdrive Energy Consumption by 1.

[Waltz of the Wicked] can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] is triggered, this skill refunds 8s of its cooldown and additionally deals Physical Damage equal to 400% of Attack to the affected target.

skills.name: Waltz of the Wicked
skills.description: Fires a continuous barrage of projectiles, each wave dealing 45% of the user's Attack as Physical Damage to enemies within a large circular area. This skill is not affected by Attack Speed buffs, but the number of projectile waves is influenced by Attack Speed bonuses. At 0%/40%/100%/180% Attack Speed bonus, it fires 8/10/12/15 waves of projectiles.

skills.name: Grenade
skills.description:
Toss a Grenade to deal Physical Damage equal to 228% of Attack to enemy units in a small circular area.
Triggers [Punishment] effect. When [Punishment] activates, inflicts additional [Physical Defense Down].

skills.name: Demonbane Crossbow
skills.description:
Shoot with flair, dealing physical damage equal to 290% of Attack to a single target.
When the [Punishment] effect triggers, damage is boosted by 50%.

skills.name: Adrenaline Rush
skills.description:
Boosts Attack Speed by 16%.
Each Overdrive use grants 1 stack of [Awakening]. When an [Awakening] stack is available, instantly consume it to trigger an extra cast of [Grenade] or [Demonbane Crossbow].

talent_levels.effect: When HP is low, accumulates Rage. When Rage is full, enters the [Wild] status. While [Wild], Attack Speed is increased by 90%.
When casting [Boiling Blood], grants [Fervor] to self.
Increases Attack by 12%.
When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, increases Life Steal by 20%.

skills.name: Boiling Blood
skills.description: Consumes 45% of current HP to gain [Attack Boost] and [Lifesteal].

skills.name: Pyreforged Lance
skills.description: Each Basic Attack consumes 5% of current Health and deals additional Physical Damage equal to 11% of lost Health.

skills.name: Heart of Ambition
skills.description: Increases self Life Steal by 13%.

talent_levels.effect: Basic Attack has a 33% chance to deal additional Physical Damage equal to 180% of Attack and summon a Boar (only one boar can exist at a time). The Boar inherits 50% of Attack, 30% of Health, and 100% of all other stats.
Gains [Morale] when casting [Meteor Shower].
Increases Attack by 12%.
When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, [Dud] damage is doubled.

skills.name: Meteor Shower
skills.description: Throws a huge rock, dealing 410% of Attack as Physical Damage to enemies in a large circular area around the target.

skills.name: Elegance in Motion
skills.description: Deals Physical Damage equal to 240% of own Attack to enemy units in a medium circular area around the target.

skills.name: Cannibalize
skills.description: Grants 190 Crit Up. Each stack of [Deathrattle], increases Crit by an additional 15.

talent_levels.effect: At the start of the battle, gains 4 bullets. Each Basic Attack consumes 1 bullet and deals additional Physical Damage equal to 52% of own Attack to enemy units in a medium circular area around the target. When out of bullets, will reload and cannot perform Basic Attacks during this time.
Attack increases by 20% when attacking targets with an Overdrive Energy cost of 4 or more.
Increases Attack by 10%.

skills.name: Blazing Barrel
skills.description: Fires 4 shells, each dealing Physical Damage equal to 160% of own Attack to enemy units in a small circular area. Upon firing, grants self [Fervor].

skills.name: Heavy Cannon
skills.description: Deals Physical Damage equal to 270% of own Attack to enemy units in a medium circular area around the target.

talent_levels.effect: Each time an ally uses Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. At 3 stacks of [Awakening], the stacks are consumed to increase self Attack Speed by 60% for 8 seconds.
Attack increases by 20% when attacking targets with an Overdrive Energy cost of 4 or more.
Increases Attack by 10%.

skills.name: Cloudpiercer
skills.description: Charges forth, shooting an arrow that deals physical damage equal to 415% of Attack to enemy units within a medium circle around the target.

skills.name: Burst Fire
skills.description: Lets fly a torrent of shots at a single target, dealing physical damage equal to 291% of Attack.

talent_levels.effect: Increases Attack Speed by 15%.

skills.name: Lightning Rod
skills.description: Releases an electric shock to a random enemy Luminary every 0.5 seconds for 6 seconds. Each shock deals physical damage equal to 55% of Attack.

name: Loki
title: Goddess of Mischief
lore: Loki, an Asgardian god born of giants. Her giant status destined her to be disliked by the Asgardian gods, yet her power forced them to suppress their discontent. She was like a double prism, sometimes revealing a dazzling and cunning allure, and at other times transforming into an unfathomable chaotic fire.

talent_levels.effect:
When its own health drops below 50% for the first time, it enters an invincible and untargetable state for 5 seconds. During this time, it recovers 30% of its maximum health and creates a mirror image on the spot (a maximum of 2 mirror images can exist on the field). The mirror image inherits 70% of its own attack, 60% of its health, and 100% of its other attributes for 30 seconds. The mirror image will then perform a basic attack on the nearest enemy unit.
When your own health decreases, you will accumulate rage. When your rage is full, you will enter the [Wild] state. When you are in the [Wild] state, your mirror image will cast the same skill after you cast it.
[Master of Deception] can be triggered an additional time, when the user's health drops below 30% for the first time.
[Twin Souls] additionally grants [Damage Reduction Up].
The enhanced version of [Soul Chains]'s sealing effect lasts until the user die
Increases own attack by 8% and life conversion by 12%.
Increases own life conversion by 20%.

skills.name: Repeat the Same Trick
skills.description:
Copy and release an enhanced version of the last skill you released: Enhanced version of [Evil Mark Demon Bullet]: Damage coefficient increased to 1540% of own attack. If the target is marked, this skill will have an additional 1500 critical hit. Enhanced [Soul Chains]: Damage coefficient increased to 950% of own attack, seal effect extended to 10 seconds.
Enhanced version of [Twin Souls]: Increases range and damage coefficient to 1100% of own attack; creates an additional mirror image at the starting position.
Whenever an allied unit is defeated, the user gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle] the user has, the user's second skill haste is increased.

skills.name: Evil Mark Demon Bullet
skills.description:
Consumes 20% of current HP to unleash a magic missile at the furthest enemy Luminary, dealing magic damage equal to 825% of the user's attack and marking the target for 8 seconds. This skill also grants 60% HP conversion.
Skills cast by the user or their mirror image that deal damage to a marked target ignore 40% of the target's magic defense. (This defense-ignoring effect can stack up to 40%).

skills.name: Twin Souls
skills.description: Consumes 30% of its current health to collide with the furthest enemy Luminary and create a mirror image, dealing magic damage equal to 655% of its attack to enemy units within a medium-sized circular area around the target and inflicting [Magic Defense Down].

skills.name: Soul Chains
skills.description: Cast a magic key on a single target to deal magic damage equal to 610% of your attack over 3 seconds. After 3 seconds, [Seal] the target's special ability, which lasts for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Soul Absorption
skills.description: Each time the user applies [Seal], they steal 25 points of skill haste from the [Seal] target until the [Seal] ends (this can only be done once per target; applying [Seal] to a mirror image does not trigger the stealing effect; the stealing effect is ineffective against bosses).

name: Poseidon
title: Sea Goddess
lore: Poseidon, the goddess of the sea, is the ruler of the ocean, earthquakes, and horses. Legend has it that Poseidon gave humankind its first horse, and she often drove a golden chariot drawn by white horses across the sea.

talent_levels.effect:
All Poseidon's skills inflict [Chill].
When triggering [Elemental Reaction], instantly deals additional Magic Damage equal to 80% of Poseidon's Attack.
Starts battle with full Energy and immediately casts [Tide of the Abyss] once.
[Frost Barrier] Usable times +1. When Poseidon is present, the Magic Defense of all enemies is reduced by 10%.
For each [Elemental Debuff] on the target, damage increases by 25%.
Increases Attack by 12% and Crit by 80.
Increases Crit by 200.

skills.name: Wail of the Deep
skills.description: Unleash a tidal wave on enemies across a massive area, dealing magic damage equal to 400% of Attack.

skills.name: Ice Age
skills.description: At the start of battle, summons a blizzard, continuously knocking back enemy units while dealing magic damage equal to 260% of Attack.

skills.name: Tide of the Abyss
skills.description:
Max Energy +5.
Gains 1 Energy whenever an [Elemental Reaction] is triggered by an ally.
At full Energy, automatically unleashes a torrent on enemies with the lowest Overdrive Energy Consumption, dealing 135% of Attack as Magic Damage.
If the target's Overdrive Energy Consumption is less than 4, its next Overdrive costs +1 Energy.

skills.name: Frost Barrier
skills.description:
When your Luminary receives lethal Damage, they are frozen for 3 seconds, becoming Immune to lethal Damage while recovering HP equal to 400% of their Attack (up to 100% of target's max HP).
Can only trigger once per battle.

skills.name: Elemental Response
skills.description: [Wail of the Deep] Each time an allied Luminary triggers an [Elemental Reaction], its own Ultimate Skill damage is increased by 5%, up to a maximum of 50%.

name: Crassus
title: Iron-Fisted Ruler
lore: Crassus was born into a military aristocratic family in the Nibelgard Empire, receiving rigorous tactical and leadership training from a young age. As the sole heir to the family fortune, she not only continued the martial tradition but also broke free from the family's shackles of solely engaging in military affairs with her exceptional business acumen, accumulating immense wealth through numerous successful investments. With her unique personal charisma and iron-fisted methods, she built a private army completely loyal to her, continuously expanding the family's sphere of influence. Ultimately, relying on shrewd political strategy and decisive military action, she ascended to the high position of Imperial Consul.

talent_levels.effect: Each time our side triggers the [Punishment] effect, there is a 50% chance to steal 0.6 seconds of ultimate cooldown from the [Punishment] target.
