This chance increases by 5% for each stack of [Governor's Intimidation], and then grants ourselves one stack of [Governor's Intimidation].
When [Pulse Arc] deals damage, it increases the target's ultimate skill cooldown by 4 seconds.
Increases own health by 10% and critical strike chance by 50%.
[Gravity Star Core] now consumes a maximum of 3 stacks of [Governor's Intimidation].
When present, allied Luminaries and Wyrms deal 50% more damage to enemy units that are not currently buffed.

skills.name: Gravitational Star Core
skills.description: Summons a meteorite that deals up to 14 instances of magic damage equal to 90% of the caster's attack to enemy units along a straight line. If the caster's [Governor's Intimidation] is at full stacks, the caster's ultimate energy cost is reduced by 3. When cast, the caster summons an enhanced meteorite that adds a knockback effect. Each instance of the enhanced meteorite deals up to 90% of the caster's attack and dispels one buff from the target each time it deals damage. For each stack of [Governor's Intimidation] you have, this skill's damage increases by 30%. The skill consumes all [Governor's Intimidation] upon completion.

skills.name: Pulsed Electric Arc
skills.description: Unleash lightning, dealing magic damage equal to 510% of your attack to enemy units in a small fan-shaped area. Each time our side releases an ultimate skill, we gain 1 stack of [Awakening]. When releasing this skill, if we have more than 2 stacks of [Awakening], we will consume 2 stacks of [Awakening] to enhance this skill, increasing its range, increasing its damage to 1020% of our attack, and dispelling 1 buff from the target.

skills.name: Expropriation Agreement
skills.description: During battle, increases own attack and health by 10%. While present, there is a 50% chance to steal 1 Ultimate Point from the enemy team whenever an enemy unit dies (maximum of 1 time within 10 seconds).

skills.name: Collapse Point
skills.description: Summons a magic orb at the enemy Luminary with the highest skill speed, dealing magic damage equal to 390% of the caster's attack to enemy units within a medium circular area, and inflicting the effect of [Next Ultimate Skill Energy Cost +1]. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect, which inflicts 6 seconds of [Silence] upon triggering the [Punishment] effect.

skills.name: Star Core Remains
skills.description: [Gravitational Star Core] After dealing damage, the target will be unable to gain any buffs for 6 seconds.

name: Faust
title: Demon Overlord
lore: Driven by a thirst for knowledge, she performed a secret art of immortality, remaining in the world as a young girl for hundreds of years, becoming a scholar who had read all the books in the world and possessed all the knowledge in the world. Because there was no new knowledge left for her to learn, she felt an unbearable boredom. So she embarked on a journey to find that knowledge, which may or may not exist, that would "satisfy her".

talent_levels.effect: When both Krul and self are on the field, both gain +28% Attack. Each time an ally is defeated, self gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. When Krul is damaged and HP drops below 80%, consumes 1 stack of [Deathrattle] to heal Krul for 110% of self's Attack.
[Krul Charge] Can trigger [Punishment]. When triggering [Punishment], also applies [Damage Reduction Down].
Increases HP by 10% and Crit by 50.
Using [Krul Charge] immediately resets the cooldown of [Bunny Bomb]. While carrying the bomb, Krul gains an extra 40% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
While carrying the Bomb, Krul's attacks have a 30% chance to increase the target's Overdrive Energy Consumption by 1 for their next Overdrive.

skills.name: Krul Charge
skills.description: Summons Krul, dealing 390% Magic Damage based on Faust's Attack to enemies in a medium circle and inflicting [Stun] for 0.1s. Krul inherits 100% of Faust's Attributes and automatically attacks enemies, each hit dealing 125% Magic Damage based on its Attack to a single target. If carrying [Bunny Bomb], Krul deals 245% Magic Damage based on its Attack to enemies in a medium circle instead.

skills.name: Bunny Bomb
skills.description: Launches a Bunny Bomb at a single target that sticks to them. After 5s, it explodes to deal 275% of Attack as Magic Damage to enemies in a medium circular area. When Krul is present, the Bunny Bomb attaches to Krul instead.

skills.name: Overload
skills.description: After using a skill, your next Basic Attack gains a Buff: Deal Magic Damage equal to 165% of your Attack to all enemies within a large circular area.

skills.name: Hairpin Dart
skills.description: Releases a crescent shockwave, blasting enemies in a line for 248% of the Luminary's Attack as magic damage.

skills.name: Guardian Material
skills.description: [Hairpin Dart] When released, it provides an additional shield to both the caster and Kururu, equal to 120% of the caster's attack, lasting for 10 seconds.

name: Gabriele
title: Archangel
lore: One of the archangels of Heaven, she is proud and steadfast in her duty as the guardian of the realm. Protected by the gods, she is invincible and frequently bestows celestial power upon righteous warriors, earning her the adoration of the brave. She is fiercely opposed to evil and bears the mission of eradicating all darkness and wickedness from the world, leading the celestial army in an eternal battle against Hell.

talent_levels.effect:
Gains 510 Crit Up. Each critical hit restores 4% of max HP.
When both [Morale] and [Fervor] are present, enters [Grace] status.
While in [Grace] status, gains a further 510 Crit Up.
Each time a [Deathrattle] is obtained, reduces the Cooldown of [Benediction] by 2 seconds.
Increase your Attack by 10% and Crit Damage by 5%.
For each [Blessing Buff] status, increase Crit Damage by 20%.
While in the [Grace] status, all damage ignores 30% of the target's Magic Defense (can stack up to 40%).

skills.name: Invictus
skills.description:
Assumes the form of a six-winged angel and unleashes a series of slashes, dealing magic damage equal to 425% of Attack to enemy units in a large circle.
Becomes untargetable during this skill.

skills.name: Hour of Reckoning
skills.description: Releases four arcs of sword energy, dealing magic damage equal to 330% of Attack to enemy units in a line.

skills.name: Benediction
skills.description: Grants [Morale] to self and 2 random allied Luminaries (prioritizing Sanctum Glory faction) at the start of the battle.

skills.name: Celestial Awakening
skills.description:
Gains a 30% Overdrive Damage Boost. Each time an ally unit is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle].
When casting [Invictus], consumes up to 5 stacks of [Deathrattle].
For each stack consumed, [Invictus] gains a 15% Overdrive Damage Boost.

skills.name: Supreme Judgement
skills.description: [Benediction] Additionally grants [Attack Boost].

name: Gullveig
title: Demilich
lore: A priestess with extensive knowledge of potions and torture, she can observe the movements of other planes. However, legend says that only she possesses the secret art of resurrection, which is the reason her status is comparable to that of a god. Beneath her alluring exterior lies a twisted personality and eccentricities, finding pleasure in toying with humans.
quote: The age of the gods is long gone!

talent_levels.effect: When dealing damage, for each debuff on the target, damage increases by 12% (up to 60%).
[Soul Siphon] and [Netherblast] have a 10% chance to apply [Healing Down] after dealing Damage, with the chance increased by 1% for each stack of [Deathrattle].
Increases own Magic Defense by 15% and Attack by 5%.
[Abyssal Grasp] now applies [Heal Block].
[Soul Siphon] and [Netherblast] hit an additional target (targets the enemy Luminary with the highest Attack).

skills.name: Abyssal Grasp
skills.description: Applies [Healing Down] to enemy units within a large circle and deals magic damage equal to 330% of Attack.

skills.name: Soul Siphon
skills.description: Drains HP from a target over 6s, dealing magic damage equal to 470% of Attack and restoring HP equal to 282% of Attack to the ally with the lowest health percentage.

skills.name: Eternal Youth
skills.description:
In battle, increases Attack by 11%.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Attack increases by an additional 1%.

skills.name: Netherblast
skills.description: Deals Magic Damage equal to 230% of own Attack to enemies within a medium circular area around the target and applies [Chill].

skills.name: Death Scythe
skills.description: [Abyssal Grasp] Deals additional magic damage equal to 30% of the target's missing health (up to a maximum of 300% of the user's attack).

name: Hitomi
title: The Demon King of Chaos
lore:
Hitomi, a Sengoku daimyo who rose from humble beginnings in one province to rule the entire Kinai region, successfully stormed Kyoto after breaking through the encirclement of various powerful daimyo, took control of the shogunate, and ultimately became the ruler of the entire Ashihara region.
As a child, Hitomi was known as a "big fool" among the people. She despised the rigid etiquette of the Eastern Kingdom and disdained her studies, often causing her parents headaches with her unruly nature. It wasn't until Hitomi personally led her army to conquer several cities and achieved numerous victories that people realized that the young lord's military talent was not to be underestimated.

talent_levels.effect:
At the start of the battle, Hitomi establishes a [Link] with the ally Luminary with the highest attack power in the same row. Hitomi and the [Link] ally Luminary gain a 15% increase in attack and defense for each other.
When an allied Luminary with the [Link] buff deals active skill damage to the current target, it grants the pupil 1 stack of [Prison Vision].
Each stack of [Prison Vision] increases attack and both defenses by 0.8%. When the stack reaches 20, the bonus provided by [Prison Vision] is doubled.
Whenever the user or an allied Luminary with the [Link] buff receives a [Blessing Buff], the user recovers HP equal to 30% of their attack and 30% of their defense.
Increases own health by 10% and attack by 5%.

Each time an allied Luminary with the [Link] buff enters the [Wild] state, remove all [Increased Energy Cost of Next Ultimate] effects from it and make it immune to the [Increased Energy Cost of Next Ultimate] effect during the [Wild] state.

When the [Prison Vision] reaches 20 stacks, allied Luminaries carrying the [Link] buff will receive a 40% attack and defense bonus corresponding to the 20 stacks of [Prison Vision]. If the Luminary is in the [Wild] state, the bonus will be increased to 80%.

skills.name: Demon-Subduing Consecutive Slashes
skills.description:
Performs 3 dash slashes, each dealing 690% of the user's attack as physical damage to enemy units in a semi-circle in front of the target, prioritizing enemy Luminaries that have not been slashed.
When you lose health, you will recover rage. When your rage is full, you will enter the [Wild] state. If you are in the [Wild] state while casting a skill, you will perform an additional dash slash, up to 3 times.

skills.name: Chaotic Storm
skills.description:
Deals two instances of physical damage equal to 207% of the user's attack to the current target.
When you have both Morale and Fighting Spirit, you enter the Grace state. While in the Grace state, your second attack will create a tornado that knocks back enemy units in its path and deals physical damage equal to 275% of your attack.

skills.name: The First Signs of Chaos
skills.description: When dealing basic attack or active skill damage to a new target, it deals additional damage equal to 650% of its own attack + 650% of its dual defenses, and grants itself and the allied Luminary with the [Link] buff a random [Blessing Buff].

skills.name: Four Tours in Chaotic Times
skills.description: Consumes 10% of current health, knocks the current target back, and deals 4 slashes, resulting in a total of 700% of the user's attack as physical damage and inflicting [Damage Down].

skills.name: Demon King of Chaos
skills.description: When the user is in the [Wild] state, the additional damage of [The First Signs of Chaos] is doubled.

name: Talos
title: Bronze Goddess
lore: One of the greatest creations of the Bronze Age, Talos was forged in bronze by Hephaestus, and Zeus granted her immortality with the elixir of the gods. When her colossal body vanished, Talos embarked alone on a journey to find the elixir and a way to restore her to her former glory.

talent_levels.effect: After the battle begins, place 3 mechanical orbs to be activated next to the enemy Luminary with the highest attack. During the battle, each time you release a skill, you will place 1 mechanical orb to be activated. When its own health decreases, it will accumulate rage. When the rage is full, it enters the [Wild] state. While in the [Wild] state, all mechanical orbs that are waiting to be activated will be activated. The activated state lasts for 5 seconds. The activated mechanical orbs attack the nearest enemy unit every 0.5 seconds. Each attack deals magic damage equal to 90%/96%/102%/108%/114%/120%/126% of its own attack.
The duration of the mechanical ball's active state is extended to 8 seconds.
Increases own attack by 5% and skill haste by 5.
[Shield Command] and [Charge Command] will additionally grant the user the same effect.
[Charge Command] will be released once immediately at the start of the battle, and the first release will always target the ally with the highest skill speed other than itself.

skills.name: Destroy Command
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 510%/535%/560%/585%/610%/635% of the user's attack to enemy units in a large circular area. Restores 20% of the user's rage for each mechanical orb on the field. Every 5 mechanical spheres activated permanently reduce the user's ultimate energy consumption by 1 (at most 2).

skills.name: Attack Command
skills.description: Launches a mechanical ball at a random target, dealing magic damage equal to 115%/125%/135%/145%/155%/165% of the caster's attack to enemy units along its path. Upon reaching the target location, it deals magic damage equal to 230%/250%/270%/290%/310%/330% of the caster's attack to enemy units within a medium circular area. Each time our side releases an ultimate skill, we gain 1 stack of [Awakening]. Releasing this skill consumes 4 stacks of [Awakening] to gain enhancement and place 2 additional mechanical orbs waiting to be activated.

skills.name: Charge Command
skills.description: Reduces the cooldown of your ultimate skill by 4.5/4.7/4.9/5.1/5.3/5.5 seconds for one random allied Luminary other than yourself.

skills.name: Shield Command
skills.description: Grants a shield to one allied Luminary with the highest rage (excluding itself) equal to 330%/360%/390%/420%/450% of its own attack and grants it [Crit Up]. The shield lasts for 8 seconds, and during the shield's duration, it restores 14% of the Luminary's rage per second.

skills.name: Shield Overload
skills.description: [Shield Command] additionally grants [Adrenaline].

name: Vermilion Bird
title: Four Saints
lore: Born from the power of the stars, the Vermilion Bird Goddess is one of the Four Divine Beasts, along with the Azure Dragon, White Tiger, and Black Tortoise, and has protected the human world through the changing seasons for thousands of years. She is responsible for guarding the south, and always appears as a girl in red, holding a feather fan made of flames, controlling the purest fire in the world, and commanding the seven southern constellations.

talent_levels.effect: Each time an enemy unit is affected by [Detonation] or [Evaporation], it gains an additional stack of [Sunfire]. When attacking a target under the [Sunfire] status, increase your damage by 18% for each stack of [Sunfire] on the target.
When our side triggers [Punishment], we gain 1 energy.
Increases own attack by 15%.

Each time [Rebirth] is triggered, it increases the user's attack by 30% and increases the probability of [Life-Renewing Feather Fan] inflicting [Ignite] by 25%, stacking up to 2 times, lasting until the end of the battle.
[Brahma Fire Dance] will continuously apply a pulling effect to targets within range, and [Rebirth] will deal an additional amount of magic damage when in egg form.

skills.name: Brahma Fire Dance
skills.description: Unleashes a fire tornado, dealing 10 instances of magic damage equal to 53.6% of the caster's attack to enemy units within a large circular area, and inflicting 3 instances of [Ignite]. Before the fire tornado disappears, it deals an additional 268% of the caster's attack as magic damage and slightly knocks back enemy units within its area of effect. This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect (up to 1 time per target), and when the [Punishment] effect is triggered, an additional 3 stacks of [Sunfire] are applied.

skills.name: Flame Shadow Talisman
skills.description: Unleashing a rune that deals magic damage equal to 560% of the caster's attack to enemy units within a small circular area, and increases the energy cost of the next ultimate skill by 1. When this skill deals damage to a target under the [Sunfire] status, it will additionally deal magic damage equal to 280% of the user's attack multiplied by the number of [Sunfire] stacks on the target.

skills.name: Life-Renewing Feather Fan
skills.description: [Flame Shadow Talisman] [Rebirth]: Before dealing damage, there is a 50% chance to inflict [Ignite] on the enemy. She has a maximum of 9 energy points. Each time an ally triggers an [Elemental Reaction], she gains 1 energy point. When at full energy, if she triggers [Detonation] or [Evaporation], she loses 50% of her current HP and deals magic damage equal to 1280% of her attack to the affected target.

skills.name: Rebirth
skills.description: When the user receives fatal damage and has full energy, they consume all energy to become immune to damage for 2 seconds and transform into an egg form. For 5 seconds, the user continuously regenerates 100% of their maximum health. The egg form then dissolves, dealing magic damage equal to 1200% of the user's attack to all enemy units (Can trigger at most once every 15 seconds). While in egg form, when damaged by ranged Luminaries, gain 1000% damage reduction and become immune to control effects.

skills.name: Everlasting Life
skills.description: [Rebirth] Gain full energy at the start of battle.

name: Cerberus
title: Hell Hound
lore: The beast of the underworld, the hellhound, guards the gate, and no one is allowed to leave from here.
quote: I'll split you into three pieces.

talent_levels.effect: Increases own Attack by 24% during battle. After casting skills 5 times, enters a dormant state, weakening the effects of all own skills.
[Candle of Oblivion] Applies [Ignite] after dealing damage.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
After triggering [Elemental Reaction], increases the target's next Overdrive Energy Cost by 1.
[Doomflare] Resets the dormant count after dealing damage to characters with an Overdrive Energy Cost of no less than 7.

skills.name: Doomflare
skills.description: Spits out 3 fireballs, each dealing magic damage equal to 165% of its own attack to enemy units in its path. The final fireball deals additional magic damage equal to 165% of its own attack to enemy units within a medium circular area around the target. If the target is hit by all 3 fireballs, their Overdrive Energy Consumption is increased by 1. In a dormant state, only 1 fireball is spit out.

skills.name: Cataclysm
skills.description: Sprays flames forward 3 times, each dealing magic damage equal to 118% of its own attack to enemy units in a straight line. In dormant state, only 1 flame is sprayed.

skills.name: Blazemark
skills.description: When dealing damage to enemy units with Overdrive Energy Consumption not less than 4, it deals additional magic damage equal to 42% of Attack.

skills.name: Candle of Oblivion
skills.description: Slams the ground, releasing 3 pillars of fire that deal magic damage equal to 222% of its own Attack to 3 random enemy units. In Dormant state, only 1 pillar of fire is released.

name: Cleopatra
title: Queen of Egypt
lore: Cleopatra VII, a ruthless pharaoh who ruled Egypt for many years, was a woman of immense power. Her stunning beauty captivated countless men and became a powerful tool for her strategic maneuvering. Naturally intelligent, she not only possessed keen insight into human nature but also had a deep understanding of various esoteric arts. Rumor has it that the forbidden power of resurrection was what she truly soughtâ€¦
quote: Do you seek the quicksand secrets?

talent_levels.effect: Each time a non-Overdrive skill is used, summons a Mummy (up to 4 at a time). The Mummy inherits 28% of Attack, 14% of HP, and 100% of all other Attributes, lasting for 20s.
Each time an ally uses Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. When possessing at least 2 stacks of [Awakening], consumes 2 stacks to unleash an additional [Cascade of Shifting Sands].
Increases own Attack by 15%.
Summoned Mummy has the skill [Hop 'n' Chop]: Deals Magic Damage equal to 120% of own Attack to the target and gains a Shield equal to 12% of own max HP.
When a summoned Mummy is defeated, inflicts a random [Stat Debuff] on enemies within a medium circular area.

skills.name: Arc Burst
skills.description: Deals 130% of Attack as Magic Damage to enemies in a large circular area around the target. Summons 2 additional Mummies, ignoring the usual limit. Then, all Mummies on the field charge at the designated target and self-destruct, each dealing Magic Damage equal to 350% of their Attack.

skills.name: Arc Shield
skills.description: Provides a magic Shield equal to 27% of own max HP to self and all Mummies for 10s.

skills.name: Reincarnation
skills.description:
When an ally is defeated, gain 1 stack of [Deathrattle].
Each stack increases the Attack inherited by summoned Mummies by an additional 1%.

skills.name: Cascade of Shifting Sands
skills.description: Releases quicksand, dealing Magic Damage equal to 260% of own Attack to enemy units in a straight line.

skills.name: Quicksand Dispel
skills.description: When [Cascade of Shifting Sands] deals damage, it randomly dispels one buff.

name: Melina
title: Flame Witch
lore: Melina, Child of Flame. When the Archmage found the child, he named her after himself. The baby was abandoned at Merlin's doorstep, engulfed in flames, without even a letter explaining her situation. The Archmage had no choice but to take the infant girl home, but after searching for a long time, he still didn't know who her parents wereâ€¦
quote: This is... the Grand Flame Burst!

talent_levels.effect: The first [Phoenix Talon] is buffed: Increase Overdrive damage by 50%.
When possessing both [Morale] and [Fervor], enters the [Grace] status. While in the [Grace] status, [Phoenix Talon] gains a permanent buff.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
After triggering [Elemental Reaction], grants self [Morale].
While in the [Grace] status, [Phoenix Talon] applies [Magic Defense Down] after dealing damage.

skills.name: Phoenix Talon
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 320% of own Attack to enemy units in a straight line and applies [Ignite].

skills.name: Sanctum of Light
skills.description: Deals 140% of Attack as Magic Damage to enemies in a medium circular area around the target and inflicts [Magic Defense Down].

skills.name: Arcane Blessing
skills.description: Grants [Morale] to self and one random allied Luminary (prioritizing the Sanctum Glory faction).

skills.name: Flame Mastery
skills.description: In battle, increases Attack by 15%.

skills.name: Divine Protection
skills.description: [Arcane Blessing] Additionally grants [Damage Boost].

name: Nanalie
title: Four Seasons Deer Spirit
lore: The fawn, newly transformed into human form, resembles a young girl, innocent and carefree. Unaware of the ways of the world, yet possessing a clear mind. She can communicate with plants and trees, and harbors curiosity and goodwill towards everything.

talent_levels.effect:
Gains Rage when losing HP. At max Rage, enters the [Wild] status.
While in [Wild] status, heals allied Luminaries in a large area every 3 seconds for 33% of Attack and reduces their Overdrive cooldown by 1s.
While in the [Wild] status, Overdrive Energy Cost -1.
Increases own Attack by 15%.
[Forest Sentinel] After dealing Damage each time, grants 15% Rage to self and the selected allied Luminary.
[Wild Echo] now reduces Overdrive Cooldown by 2s each time, and additionally reduces own Overdrive Cooldown by 2s.

skills.name: Heavenly Light Lotus
skills.description:
Deals 440% of Attack as Magic Damage to enemies in a large circular area around the target.
While in [Wild] status, damage dealt by this skill is increased by 30%.

skills.name: HP Power Strike
skills.description: Deals 260% of Attack as Magic Damage to a Single Target. If HP is above 50%, sacrifices an additional 30% of current HP upon casting to increase this skill's damage by 50%.

skills.name: Verdant Awakening
skills.description:
Increases Overdrive Damage by 25%.
Gains 1 stack of [Awakening] each time an ally unleashes an Overdrive.
When using an active skill with at least 4 stacks of [Awakening], consumes 4 stacks to gain [Adrenaline].

skills.name: Forest Sentinel
skills.description:
Selects the allied Luminary with the highest Rage, excluding itself (prioritizing melee), and grants it [Adrenaline].
Deal magic damage in a large circle around the selected Luminary, every 2s, for 6s. Damage is equal to 60% of Nanalie's Attack.

skills.name: Blessing of Nature
skills.description: [Forest Sentinel] Automatically triggers once on the nearest allied Luminary at the start of battle.

name: Telperion
title: Shadow Elemental
lore: These elemental creatures, born from the darkness, spend most of their time concealed and rarely appear before humans. They possess a somber nature, and the eerie glow emanating from them is often unsettlingâ€¦

talent_levels.effect: Each time skill deals damage to the same target 3 times, applies [Shock] and deals additional magic damage equal to 110% of Attack.
After triggering [Elemental Reaction], gains [Crit Up].
Increases own Attack by 15%.
[Umbral Edge] and [Voidsplitter] increase the target's next Overdrive Energy Consumption by 1 after dealing a Crit.
The trigger condition of [Void Disintegration] is changed from 3 Damage instances to 2 Damage instances.

skills.name: Ray of Ruination
skills.description:
Channels a beam of energy, dealing magic damage equal to 432% of Attack to enemy units in a straight line.
This skill can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When the [Punishment] effect is triggered, damage is increased by 40%.

skills.name: Umbral Edge
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 160% of Attack to a row of enemies, with an extra hit on the center target.

skills.name: Warp Shadow
skills.description: Critical Hit is increased by 550 when attacking enemies under [Elemental Debuff] status.

skills.name: Voidsplitter
skills.description: Deals magic damage equal to 130% of Attack to enemies in a straight line, twice.

skills.name: Prevents Healing
skills.description: [Umbral Edge] Applies an additional [Heal Block] to a single target in the center.

talent_levels.effect: When HP first drops below 30%, gain [Flame Armor] and recover 140% of Attack as HP over 3 seconds
[Flamethrower] Can trigger the [Punishment] effect. When the [Punishment] effect is triggered, additionally applies [Ignite].
Increases Attack by 12%.
When self-triggered [Elemental Reaction] occur, additionally applies [Magic Defense Down] to the target.

skills.name: Magma Pulse
skills.description: Thrusts his tail into the ground and releases pulsing shockwaves, dealing 270% of Attack as magic damage to enemies within a large circle and applying [Ignite].

skills.name: Flamethrower
skills.description: Call forth a scorching wall of fire in the target area for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage equal to 140% of Attack to enemies passing through. Enemies caught in the flames take additional magic damage per second equal to 50% of Attack.

skills.name: Arsonist
skills.description: Increases Attack by 42% when attacking enemy units with the [Ignite] status.

talent_levels.effect: When the enemy uses an Overdrive, if the Overdrive Energy Consumption is 4 or more, immediately afflicts them with [Punishment] and deals magic damage equal to 270% of Attack.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Attack increases by 1%.
Increases Attack by 12%.
[Soul Reaper] When triggered, additionally applies [Attack Down] to the target.

skills.name: Death's Embrace
skills.description: Deals Magic Damage equal to 400% of the caster's Attack to all units (both allies and enemies) within a large circular area.

skills.name: Spectral Form
skills.description: Increases own Critical Resistance by 200. Also increases Critical Resistance by 50 for each enemy Luminary on the field with an Overdrive Energy Consumption of 4 or higher.

talent_levels.effect: Basic Attacks against enemies with [Chill] Status deal bonus Magic Damage equal to 50% of your Attack power.
After triggering [Elemental Reaction], grants [Morale] to self and one random ally Luminary.
Increases Attack by 10%.

skills.name: Iceplosion
skills.description: Unleash an icy storm dealing Magic Damage equal to 300% of Attack in a medium circular area and inflict [Chill] on enemy units.

skills.name: Orb of Ice
skills.description: Deals 290% of Attack as Magic Damage to a Single Target.

talent_levels.effect:
In battle, increases Attack by 16%.
Whenever an ally is defeated, gains 1 stack of [Deathrattle]. For each stack of [Deathrattle], Attack increases by an additional 1%.
Each time an ally uses an Overdrive, gains 1 stack of [Awakening]. Each stack of [Awakening] increases Physical Defense by 4%.
Increases Attack by 10%.

skills.name: Bloodsuck
skills.description: Drains the life of a single target over 4 seconds, dealing magic damage equal to 425% of Attack and restoring health equal to 255% of Attack.

skills.name: Toxic Touch
skills.description: Deals 270% of Attack as Magic Damage to enemies within a medium circular area around the target.

talent_levels.effect: Boost your own damage output by 15%.

skills.name: Breath of Ice
skills.description: Continuously spits snowballs to deal magic damage equal to 330% of Attack to a single target.
